SA16n1275:11: tathāgataḥ svayamimaṃ dharmaṃ sādhayannapi sattvānāṃ tāraṇāya tatra tatra viprakīrṇaṃ deśitavān |

SA16n1275:44: (u) yatkiñcit tatsarvamiti vadan rūpalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhārayati nānyadastīti |

SA16n1275:70: ataḥ śabdādayaḥ sāvaraṇāḥ sapratighā ityato rūpamityucyante |

SA16n1275:94: sūtre coktaṃ yathā sparśavatī pṛthivī draṣṭavyā |
SA16n1275:95: pṛthivyādisarvāyata nagato'yaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati rūpaṃ na kaṭhinyādi |
SA16n1275:107: atra prajñaptisatīṃ pṛthivīṃ dahati na kāṭhinyamātraṃ dahati |
SA16n1275:110: kūpopame coktam-āpo dṛśyante ca spṛśyante ceti |
SA16n1275:116: kiñcāha bhagavān-aṣṭaguṇā āpaḥsusaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ mṛdu madhuraṃ śuci adurgandhaṃ pātuḥ prahlādanaṃ paridāhanivāraṇamiti |
SA16n1275:117: tatra yat susaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ sukumāraṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśāntargatam |
SA16n1275:124: upādāya dharmāḥ sarve prajñaptisantaḥ na dravyasantaḥ |
SA16n1275:127: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ || iti |
SA16n1275:132: tattu sāśrayayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānakamiti na tathāgataśāsanaṃ bhavet |
SA16n1275:135: khakkhaṭādayaścatvāro dharmāḥ kimarthā bhavantiiti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā bhavati iti prāpyate |
SA16n1275:137: ato jñāyate catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptimātrāṇi iti |
SA16n1275:146: khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ snehalakṣaṇo'bdhātuḥ ūṣmalakṣaṇastejodhātuḥ īraṇalakṣaṇo vāyudhāturiti |
SA16n1275:148: rūpādi bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyate |
SA16n1275:150: khakkhaṭādinā ca catvāri mahābhūtāni nirucyante yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sā pṛthivīti |
SA16n1275:154: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭaṃ vastudharmaḥ kharagataṃ prajñaptidharma iti |
SA16n1275:162: sūtre cāha bhagavān-yaccakṣuṣi [māṃsa] piṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī |
SA16n1275:166: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe bhagavānāha santi catvāri mahābhūtāni iti |
SA16n1275:171: yadi kaścit brūyāt catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti |
SA16n1275:173: yadi kharagataṃ pṛthivīti āpaḥ kharagatā iti tā api pṛthivī syuḥ |
SA16n1275:174: mṛtpiṇḍaḥ snehagata iti so'pi āpaḥ syāt |
SA16n1275:178: ato na vaktuṃ śakyate kharagataṃ pṛthivī,
SA16n1275:182: yathoktaṃ sūtre yatkiñcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat caturmahābhūtakṛtamiti |
SA16n1275:184: catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktustāni vinirbhaktāni syuḥ |
SA16n1275:187: tathā ca sati cakṣurmāsapiṇḍe catvāri mahābhūtāni na syuḥ |
SA16n1275:189: sūtrasyāvirodhaṃ kāmayānasya bhavataḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni dravyāṇi bhavanti |
SA16n1275:193: sarve hi tīrthikā vadanti catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vonakānīti |
SA16n1275:196: kiñca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭāni khakkhaṭādīni caturmahābhūtāni na tu vaiśeṣikāṇāmiva tānyapratyakṣadṛṣṭānyapi |
SA16n1275:200: āha ca cittaṃ mahatāṃ dharmāṇāmāśraya iti |
SA16n1275:201: asminnartha uktam khakkhaṭameva svaragataṃ na punardhamāntaramiti |
SA16n1275:203: laukikāḥ sarve śraddadhante yāvadaṣṭaguṇā āpa iti yadbhavato vacanaṃ tat vyavahārānuvartanamātrato vadanti na dravyamahābhūtā [nuvartana]taḥ |
SA16n1275:207: uktaṃ hi sūtre-yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya dharmā iti |
SA16n1275:209: bhagavān pratyāha-cakṣu[rbhikṣo] catvāri mahāmūtānyupādāya rūpaprasāda iti |
SA16n1275:213: dharme dharmo vartata iti mātraṃ vadāmaḥ |
SA16n1275:214: yadbhavānāha-khakkhaṭādayaḥ kimarthā bhavantīti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā iti bhavanti iti prāpyate iti |
SA16n1275:215: khakkhaṭādayaḥ sārthakā yaduta khakkhaṭa lakṣaṇaṃ sandhatta iti |
SA16n1275:229: bhagavān hi svayamāha-khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataśca pṛthivī iti |
SA16n1275:232: rūpādikaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyata iti bhavaduktaṃ na yujyate |
SA16n1275:239: yathā cānando bhikṣuṇīśikṣaṇāya bhaginīmāha-ayaṃ kāyaḥ āhārasambhūtaḥ tṛṣṇāsambhūto mānasambhūto maithunasambhūta iti |
SA16n1275:240: ato jñāyate rūpādi rna caturmahābhūtasambhūt iti |
SA16n1275:242: tathāpi catvāri mahābhūtāni ca aṃśena hetavaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1275:245: tathā cakṣurādīnāṃ karmasambhūtatve'pi catvāri mahābhūtāni aṃśato hetavo bhavanti |
SA16n1275:247: yathā kalpāvasāne kalpādau ca mahatī vṛṣṭiḥ |
SA16n1275:253: yathā ca rūpasantānaḥ vyucchidya punaḥ pratisandhīyate |
SA16n1275:259: utkaṭakarmabalastu na bāhyapratyayamapekṣate tathā dharmā api syuḥ |
SA16n1275:266: kenārthena khakkhaṭādito rūpādirutpadyate na rūpāditaḥ khakkhaṭādiḥ |
SA16n1275:271: na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe hetū iti |
SA16n1275:276: pradīpo hi rūpaṃ prakāśa iti dharmadvayasamavāyātmakaḥ |
SA16n1275:277: rūpameva prakāśa iti na pradīpaḥ pṛthagbhavati |
SA16n1275:287: yathā sapratidhe vijñānasya cakṣūrūpaṃ hetupratyayo bhavati |
SA16n1275:291: pūrvaniruddhaṃ cittaṃ hetuḥ iti kathaṃ yugapajjāyamānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:292: yo dharmo yaṃ hetumanuvartyotpadyate sa tasya hetuḥ |
SA16n1275:293: yaccittaṃ yadindriyāṇyupādāya bhavati sa tadupādāya dharmaḥ |
SA16n1275:304: (u) na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ asarūpahetorna jāyata iti |
SA16n1275:305: kintu sarūpahetau ca sati jāyata iti vadāmaḥ |
SA16n1275:306: tasmāducyate rūpādibhyo rūpādayo jāyante na caturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti |
SA16n1275:307: ato nābadhāraṇaṃ bhavati rūpādayaścaturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti |
SA16n1275:308: khakkhaṭādinā catvāri mahābhūtāni nirūpyanta iti yadavocadbhavān |
SA16n1275:312: saukumāryādestu aniyataḥ kadācit khakkhaṭabahule saṅghāte vartate |
SA16n1275:321: yathoktaṃ sūtre-khakkhaṭā [di]gatānīti caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vibhāgā nirdiśyanta iti |
SA16n1275:322: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭagatadharmaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ na tu khakkhaṭamātralakṣaṇa iti |
SA16n1275:327: saṃjñākriyāyai yat kiñcan khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sarvaṃ tat pṛthividhātuḥ |
SA16n1275:337: prajñaptitaḥ prasiddhe hetau prajñaptitaḥ saṃjñā bhavati yathā vadanti-paśyāmyahaṃ vṛkṣasya chettāraṃ puruṣamiti |
SA16n1275:345: kiñca tathāgate tejovatī samādhimupasampanne tatkāyā dvividhāni jvālārūpāṇi niścaranti |
SA16n1275:353: uktañcabīja sūtre yataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ syāt nābdhātuḥ na bījāni vṛddhiṃ [virūḍhiṃ vipulatā] māpadyanta iti |
SA16n1275:354: tatra kiṃ pṛthivīdhātuḥ yaduta prajñaptitaḥ kṣetram,
SA16n1275:357: ekasya dharmasya dravyatvaṃ prajñaptitvamiti dviprakāro'pi nopalabhyate |
SA16n1275:360: mahābhūtāni tu dravyataśca prajñaptitaśca santīdaṃ mithyāśāstram |
SA16n1275:362: hastipadopamasūtre coktam-keśā lomā nakhā ityādīni ayamucyate pṛthivīdhāturiti |
SA16n1275:365: yadavādīḥ bhagavānāha-yaccakṣurmāsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī ityādi |
SA16n1275:366: vacanenānena bhagavān pradarśayati pañcendriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavanti iti |
SA16n1275:369: kecidvadanti indriyāṇi nānāsvabhāvajāni yaduta pṛthivīmahābhūtāt sambhūtaṃ ghrāṇamityādi |
SA16n1275:373: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe santi catvāro bhāgāḥ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamityādi vacanena bhagavān pradarśayati sarvapadārthāḥ caturmahābhūtasambhūtā iti |
SA16n1275:378: pṛthivyādīnāṃ khakkhaṭagatadharmādayo viśiṣṭāḥ vāyostu na tathā |
SA16n1275:380: yadavādīḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktuḥ tanmahābhūtalakṣaṇāni vinirbhaktāni syuriti |
SA16n1275:384: yo dharmo lakṣaṇādanya na sa āśrayaḥ |
SA16n1275:388: (u) āśraya iti saṃjñāyate nānyadvastu lakṣaṇasyāśraya iti |
SA16n1275:394: yathā ātape kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ sparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmaḥ |
SA16n1275:395: candrikāyāṃ kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ śītasparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmāḥ |
SA16n1275:415: ataścatvāri mahābhūtāni na vinirbhāgalābhina iti jñāyate |

SA16n1275:433: pūrvaṃ yadavādīḥ-na vayaṃ brūmaḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānekāni ityato'navadyam iti |
SA16n1275:436: tīrthikāḥ sarve siṣādhayiṣantītyata ścaturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmekatvanānātve udāharanti |
SA16n1275:437: ato bhagavān prajñaptau catarṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmudāhṛtatvāt teṣāmarthamupadiśati |
SA16n1275:439: laukikāḥ svabhāvataḥ pṛthivyādimahābhūtāni jānanto'pi na vidanti [teṣāṃ] vastubhāvam |
SA16n1275:444: asti dvidhā āśrayārtha ityuktvā mahābhūtāni dravyāṇīti yadavocaḥ |
SA16n1275:447: [aṣṭaguṇā āpa iti] vyavahārānuvartanato vadanti na tu dravyamahābhūtā[nuvartana]ta iti yadvacanaṃ tadayuktam |
SA16n1275:449: yadi vā pravacane yadi vā loke na hetupratyayairvinā rūpādiṣu caturmahābhūta saṃjñāṃ kurvanti |
SA16n1275:451: rūpādiṣu hi puruṣa iti saṃjñā na hetupratyayairvinā bhavati |
SA16n1275:452: yo vināpi sudṛḍhahetupratyayaiḥ saṃjñāṃ karoti so'śvaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa ityāhvayet |
SA16n1275:455: laukikāḥ sadā [pṛthag] vadanti pṛthivīti śabda iti |
SA16n1275:462: yathārūpamidaṃ prajñapterhetuṃ sādhayati tatra puruṣa iti saṃjñā |
SA16n1275:465: evaṃ rūpādiṣu dharmeṣu catvāri mahābhūtānīti saṃjñāṃ vadanti |
SA16n1275:466: yadavocaḥ-yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya siddhā [dharmā] iti |
SA16n1275:468: yathā bhavatāṃ śāsane bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ na kasyacijjanakam |
SA16n1275:469: tathā mama śāsane'pi prajñaptau na [tat]kasyacit janyam |
SA16n1275:477: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā dharme dharmo vartate nirāśrayo niradhiṣṭhātā ceti |
SA16n1275:478: [tatra yo dharmaḥ] sa evāśrayaḥ adhiṣṭhātā ca |
SA16n1275:489: (pṛ) yadāha bhavān-khakkhaṭabahulo rūpādi [samavāyaḥ] pṛthivīmahābhūtamityataḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ prajñaptisanta iti |
SA16n1275:494: (1) yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduḥ |
SA16n1275:501: yena khakkhaṭaḥ kāyaḥ mṛduḥ kāya iti buddhirbhavet |
SA16n1275:510: anenaiva kāraṇena mṛdvādayaḥ sparśā api na santi ||

SA16n1275:542: yathāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā ūṣma jñāyate iti noṣma dṛśyaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:543: yathā puruṣaḥ kambalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ vā mṛdu iti |
SA16n1275:569: yo dharmaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ |
SA16n1275:572: āpaḥ snigdhā atiśaityāt karakā bhāvanti iti kathaṃ mahābhūtāni na svalakṣaṇaṃ jahati |
SA16n1275:573: yathāha sūtram-caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kadācit vikāryaṃ catvāraḥ śrāddhā nānyathopalabhyante |
SA16n1275:586: ato drava eva [lakṣaṇam] na tu snehaḥ syandanaṃ vā |
SA16n1275:605: (u) karmeti kevalaṃ lokasatyato vadāmaḥ na tu paramārthataḥ laghudharmamupādāya deśāntare jananadharmaḥ karmeti saṃjñāṃ labhate |
SA16n1275:610: yathā daśapalaṃ vastu viṃśatipalavastvapekṣya laghu pañcapalavastvapekṣa tu guru |
SA16n1275:626: gurutvavarjitā anye rūpādayo dharmā atulyatvāt laghavaḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1275:629: (u) na vayamaṅgīkurmo rūpādīn vihāya dharmāntaraṃ guru bhavatīti |
SA16n1275:630: rūpādaya eva dharmāḥ kecit tulyasvabhāvā utpadyante |
SA16n1275:631: yathā khakkhaṭamakhakkhaṭaṃ balamabalaṃ navaṃ purāṇamupacitamanucitaṃ kṣīṇamakṣīṇaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam ityādayaḥ |
SA16n1275:634: ayaṃ rūpādisaṅghāto yadi pārthiva āpyo vā |
SA16n1275:644: gurulaghutvavikalpo'vaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇeṣyata ityato na gururlaghuḥ rūpādisaṅghātaḥ |
SA16n1275:645: (u) te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ kadācit cakṣuṣā kadācit śrotrādīnā vikalpyante |
SA16n1275:646: te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ padārthā na rūpādīn vihāya santi |
SA16n1275:653: (pṛ) na tasmin samaye jñāyata idaṃ gurulakṣaṇamiti |
SA16n1275:654: (u) yathā parihitavastraḥ puruṣo'spṛṣṭo'pi jñāyate [ayaṃ] balavān abalavān iti |
SA16n1275:665: kecitsparśāḥ sadākāyagatāḥ na śītoṣṇādivat bāhyamapekṣyāgāminaḥ yaduta praśrabdhisukhaṃ styānaprakarṣaḥ astyānaprakarṣaḥ rogo viśeṣovā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyam ālasyagurutā mūrchā unmādaḥ pakṣavāyujṛmbhaṇabubhukṣāparitarṣaṇaparitarpaṇasukhāsukhalolupatājaḍatādayaḥ sparśāḥ |
SA16n1275:671: yathā khakkhaṭākhakkhaṭatvādayo rūpādisaṅghātavartino'pi cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā jñātuṃ śakyante |
SA16n1275:672: yathā ca praśrabdhisukhādayo rūpādisaṅghātātmakakāyenāpi vijñāya vikalpyante |
SA16n1275:674: yadi gururlaghuḥ sparśamātram [ityabhyupagamyate] ko doṣaḥ kimanayā rūpādisaṅghātavikalpakriyayā |
SA16n1275:693: kiṃntu yo laghuḥ san samudīraṇasya hetuṃ karoti |
SA16n1275:696: tatra laghutvaṃ vāyorlakṣaṇaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ vāyoḥ karma |
SA16n1275:709: kadācit kevalaṃ rūpasparśau staḥ yathā suvarṇajatādiṣu |
SA16n1275:711: kadācit trayo rūparasasparśāḥ santi tejasi kadācit rūparasagandhasparśāḥ santi |
SA16n1275:716: (u) śītoṣṇakaṭhinasukumārādayaḥ sparśāḥ yanmahābhūtasantatāvavinirbhāgavartinaḥ tasya mahābhūtasya sparśā iti jñātavyam |
SA16n1275:720: yathā vātarogiṇo mukhe tiktaraso'stīti na sa bhiṣagvavati vāyau raso'stīti |
SA16n1275:722: (pṛ) kecidvadanti vāyuḥ śīto na tu laghuriti |
SA16n1275:725: yathā himaṃ śītaṃ sat na vāyurbhavati |
SA16n1275:734: sattve'pi saukṣmyānnopalabhyata iti vaktuścitta eva saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ syāt yaduta vāyau rūparasau sta iti |
SA16n1275:737: tasmāt yatphala upalabhyate nāvaśyaṃ taddhetau pūrvamasti |
SA16n1275:744: cakṣurvikalpayan bhagavānevaṃ vacanamāha yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturiti |
SA16n1275:748: bhagavān cakṣuḥ śūnyamiti janānāṃ jijñāpayiṣayaivedṛśaṃ vacanamāha |
SA16n1275:749: tathā no cet cakṣuṣi khakkhaṭādikamanyadasti khakkhaṭādau vā anyadāsti cakṣuḥ [iti]khakkhaṭādīnāṃ vikalpe'pi nāsti kaścanopakāraḥ |
SA16n1275:753: tadā cakṣurādīni na puruṣapratyayā iti sidhyati |
SA16n1275:759: bhagavān pratyāha-catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpi anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ cakṣuḥ iti |
SA16n1275:763: laukikāḥ sarve prajānanti rūpadarśanaṃ cakṣuryāvat sparśanaṃ kāya iti |
SA16n1275:768: pañcendriyāṇi caturmahābhūtamayānīti parididṛkṣayā bhagavān pratyāha-cakṣurbhikṣo [ādhyātmikamāyatana] catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti |
SA16n1275:769: yo dharmo dravyasan na sa upādāyāsti |
SA16n1275:776: tathā nocet asya bhikṣoścakṣurādiṣu indriyeṣu śaṅkā naivocchidyeta |
SA16n1275:778: bhagavān prāha-cakṣurādīnindriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavantītyato'yaṃ bhikṣurjānāti adravyasan cakṣurdharma iti |
SA16n1275:780: bhagavān cakṣuṣaḥ śūnyatvapradarśanāya tatra catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpayati |
SA16n1275:781: yathā prajñayā aprapañcayitā vadati-ayaṃ kāyaḥ ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu vibhaktaḥ yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturityādi pratyavekṣeteti |
SA16n1275:784: hastipadopamasūtre catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpitāni na punaścakṣuḥ |
SA16n1275:787: vātsaputrīyādaya abhidharmikā api īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kurvanti |
SA16n1275:802: yāni catvāri mahābhūtāni karmajāni cakṣurādisaṅgṛhītāni [tāni] ādhyātmikamāyātanam indriyam iti ca kathyante |
SA16n1275:810: (u) na yujyata [idam] yathā prasādamupādāya āpaḥ sphaṭikam |
SA16n1275:811: āpa eva prasannā āpa iti prasāda āpa eva |
SA16n1275:817: na ca prajñaptiḥ tatsādhanahetoranyeti vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1275:842: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu anindriyāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti |
SA16n1275:847: dharmatā ca tathā-ya indriyavirahitāḥ teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti |
SA16n1275:848: na bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni anindriyāṇi janayanti iti dharmatā tadapekṣeta |
SA16n1275:850: yathā dhānyakāraṇakarmapratilambhāt dhānyaṃ bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrāṇyapekṣyāpi kramaśo jāyate |
SA16n1275:853: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurindriyakaṃ samanantaraniruddhacittamupādāya ca bhavati |
SA16n1275:859: cittadharmaśca tathā syāt-yat samanantaraniruddhacittendriyakaṃ bhavati nānyatkiñcidapekṣata iti |
SA16n1275:877: yathoktaṃ sūtre-manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata iti |
SA16n1275:905: vadanti ca mriyamāṇasya cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti |
SA16n1275:920: yathā vadanti-annaṃ datvā pañcavastu-vipākān labhata iti |
SA16n1275:929: yathā kṣālitacakṣuṣkasya puruṣasya cakṣuḥ sphuṭameva pratyeti |
SA16n1275:942: yathā cakṣurākāśādipratyayaṃ labdhvā rūpamaprāpyāpi sudūraṃ paśyati |
SA16n1275:944: ato na kāryaḥ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpoi yaduta tejobahulaṃ [cakṣu]riti |
SA16n1275:949: yathā ulūkādayaḥ pakṣiṇo viḍālasṛgālādayastīryañca bāhyāmālokamanapekṣyāpi draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti |
SA16n1275:963: upari devānāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ cakṣuḥ kutra pratigacchati |
SA16n1275:973: tasmādindriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavantīti bhavadvacanaṃ dūṣitameva |
SA16n1275:977: abtejovāyuṣu rūparasasparśāḥ santi iti rūparasasparśajñānotpādakā bhavanti |
SA16n1275:991: apāṃ śītasparśamātraṃ tejasa uṣṇasparśamātraṃ jivhācakṣurbhyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyāt |
SA16n1275:999: (pṛ) indriyāṇi viṣayān kiṃ prāpya vijānanti utāprāpya vijānanti |
SA16n1275:1006: bhavato hṛdayam-yatkecidvadanti indriyaṃ vijñānamapekṣya saha vijānāti na tu vijñānaviyuktaṃ vijānātīti |
SA16n1275:1011: yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti idamindriyakarma idaṃ vijñānakarma iti vivektavyam |
SA16n1275:1016: bhavatāṃ śāsane śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi na tejaḥprakṛtikāni iti na prakāśayeyuḥ |
SA16n1275:1020: tadā prakāśakasya punaḥ prakāśaka ityevamanavasthā syāt |
SA16n1275:1021: yadi punaḥ prakāśakaṃ vināpi indriyamātraṃ prakāśayati |
SA16n1275:1030: yathā sati tejasi ūṣma nāsati iti |
SA16n1275:1031: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ-cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī syāditi |
SA16n1275:1036: uktañca sūtre-vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamaṣi vastu jānīmaḥ |
SA16n1275:1042: indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate ityayamevendriyavijñānayorbhedaḥ |
SA16n1275:1043: (u) sūtre bhagavān svayamāha-cakṣu[brāhmaṇa]dvāraṃ[yāvadeva] rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya iti |
SA16n1275:1047: (pṛ) āha ca-mano dvāraṃ [yāvadeva] dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāye ti |
SA16n1275:1060: kiñca laukikā vyavaharanti-cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti iti |
SA16n1275:1063: āha ca bhagavān-paśyāmi rāgādīn doṣān iti |
SA16n1275:1064: candraḥ kṣīṇa iti laukikānāṃ vacanaṃ bhagavānapyanuvadati |
SA16n1275:1071: (u) cakṣuṣo vijñānāśrayahetutāmanusṛtya tasmin hetau paśyatīti vadanti |
SA16n1275:1072: yathā vadanti sa puruṣaḥ paśyati ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatīti |
SA16n1275:1073: yathā ca vadanti janāḥ puṇyapāpādīni kurvanti |
SA16n1275:1075: yathā ca vadanti vāmacakṣuṣā paśyati dakṣiṇacakṣuṣā paśyatīti |
SA16n1275:1076: vadanti ca sūryācandramasābhyāṃ paśyati sūryācandramasau paśyataḥ |
SA16n1275:1078: kadācinmadhyaṃ paśyati yat dvāramadhyaṃ [tat] paśyati iti |
SA16n1275:1093: cakṣurupādāya vijñāne paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ |
SA16n1275:1094: yathā mañcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośantīti vyavahāraḥ |
SA16n1275:1095: cakṣuḥpratisaṃyuktaṃ vijñānakarma ityatastatra cakṣuṣi vijñānakarma vyavaharanti |
SA16n1275:1096: yathā hastapādapratisaṃyukte puruṣe vartamānaṃ puruṣakarma hastakarmeti vyavaharanti |
SA16n1275:1099: yathā vadanti amukaḥ puruṣo'mukaṃ grāmaṃ dahatīti |
SA16n1275:1104: evaṃ cakṣurbhyomutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyatītyataścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavaharanti |
SA16n1275:1105: cakṣuḥsannikṛṣṭe vijñāne rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ |
SA16n1275:1107: cakṣuṣā cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ vivicyata ityataścakṣuṣi cākṣuṣavijñānakarmāropyate |
SA16n1275:1110: yathā dhane prahīṇe puruṣaḥ prahīṇa iti vadanti |
SA16n1275:1111: pravivṛddhe ca dhane pravivṛddhaḥ puruṣa iti |
SA16n1275:1112: cakṣurvijñāne cakṣuṣā saṃyujya paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti |
SA16n1275:1113: yathā vṛkṣe puruṣeṇa saṃyujya chidyamāne sati puruṣo vṛkṣaṃ chinnattīti vyavahāraḥ |
SA16n1275:1114: yathā vā kṛṣṇavarṇasaṃyukte paṭe kṛṣṇaḥ paṭa iti vyavahāraḥ |
SA16n1275:1115: sarve ca dharmā mithaḥ saṃkīrya vyavahriyante |
SA16n1275:1117: cakṣūṣā rūpaṃ paśyatīti vaktavye saṃkṣipya vyavaharantaḥ kevalamāhuḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti |
SA16n1275:1120: bhavānidaṃ prativaktavyaḥ cakṣurādayaḥ pañcadharmā stadanyarūpādīnatiśerata ityata indriyamiti vyavahriyante |
SA16n1275:1124: tathā yadi rūpādīnāṃ viyoge'pi vijñānaṃ notpadyate |
SA16n1275:1133: rūpavijñānamityukte saṃśayaḥ prasajyate kimidaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kiṃ vā rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñānamiti |
SA16n1275:1141: prasanne tu indriye vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:1145: eko viṣayo bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa upalabhyate |
SA16n1275:1154: yadbhavānavādīḥ-vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamapi vastu jānīmaḥ tadyathā cakṣurmyāṃ dṛśyate iti |
SA16n1275:1156: laukikāścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadantītyata āhuḥ tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti |
SA16n1275:1160: acetanāpi jihvā tu na darvībhājanopamā || iti |
SA16n1275:1161: jihvāśritaṃ mano jihvāvijñānaṃ janayatītyata āha jihvā [sūpa] rasaṃ vettīti |
SA16n1275:1162: tathā cakṣurāśritya samutpanne vijñāne cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti |
SA16n1275:1163: ata āha-jinaurasāḥ paśyanti tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti |
SA16n1275:1164: yadbhavānavādīḥ-indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate iti |
SA16n1275:1167: na ca yūyaṃ bravītha indriyasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇa iti |
SA16n1275:1181: idānīṃ kiṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogādvijñānamutpadyate kiṃ vā tadviyogāt |
SA16n1275:1190: ato jñātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na prāpya vijānāti | iti |
SA16n1275:1196: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu trayāṇāmeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyogāt vijñānaṃ labhyata iti |
SA16n1275:1215: ghrāṇaṃ gandhe jihvā rase kāyaḥ spraṣṭavye cakṣūrūpe śrotraṃ śabde yadyaprāptam |
SA16n1275:1221: bahupratyayasāmagryā ca jñānamutpadyate iti cakṣūraśmirviṣayasaṃyogāya gacchati |
SA16n1275:1225: viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śrūyate |
SA16n1275:1235: aprāpya śravaṇe tu sa vibhāgo na syāt |
SA16n1275:1236: ato jñāyate śabdaḥ prāpya śrūyata iti |
SA16n1275:1241: aprāpya śravaṇe tu na sākalyena śrūyeta |
SA16n1275:1242: yathā rūpasyāprāptyā darśānāt na sākalyena darśanam |
SA16n1275:1243: ato jñāyate na rūpasamaḥ śabda iti |
SA16n1275:1245: yathā rūpasyekadeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśiṣṭamapi ālokamapekṣya paśyati |
SA16n1275:1257: śabdaṃ yadi ghananibiḍaṃ jalādyāvṛtamapi śrotraṃ śrotuṃ śaknoti |
SA16n1275:1266: ekāṃ diśaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti naikasmin samaye sarvā diśo draṣṭuṃ śaknoti |
SA16n1275:1267: yathā pūrvābhimukhaḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rūpañca paśyati nānyā diśaḥ |
SA16n1275:1274: parispandatīdaṃ cittaṃ svābhīṣṭañca yathā caratyadaḥ || iti |
SA16n1275:1278: yathā puruṣo dūrataḥ sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimayaṃ puruṣa iti |
SA16n1275:1285: kasmāt sthūlaṃ paśyati na sūkṣmaṃ vivecayati |
SA16n1275:1286: rūpadarśane'sti dvibhāgaḥ yaduta pūrvasyāṃ paścimāyāṃ vā diśi rūpamiti |
SA16n1275:1308: tasya nayanaraśme rasati draṣṭari sa na syāt |
SA16n1275:1312: (pṛ) rūpa dharmā avaśyaṃ bāhyaṃ prakāśamapekṣya dṛśyante |
SA16n1275:1328: yat rūpaṃ jñānasya gocaraṃ tat dṛśyam |
SA16n1275:1338: yathā bhavataścakṣū rūpaṃ prāpyāpi kadācitpaśyati kadācinna paśyati |
SA16n1275:1339: tadyathā cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ prāpya sūryamaṇḍalaṃ paśyati na tu sūryakarma |
SA16n1275:1349: kasmād dūrasthaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi karma na paśyati tat pāṭaliputrādi āsannaṃ janapadanagaram |
SA16n1275:1350: yadi bhavān manyate pāṭaliputrādi na ābhāsagatamityato na paśyatīti |
SA16n1275:1351: mama cakṣuraprāpyāpi rūpaṃ nābhāsāgatamityato na paśyati |
SA16n1275:1355: rūpasyābhibhāvakaviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā rātrau tejo dṛśyamanyadadṛśyam |
SA16n1275:1356: bhūmiviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā prathamadhyānagatacakṣuṣā dvitīyadhyānagataṃ rūpaṃ na dṛśyate |
SA16n1275:1357: tama āvāvaraṇānna dṛśyate yathā tamasi ghaṭaḥ |
SA16n1275:1363: aprāptyā na dṛśyate yathā prabhāgatā aṇavoḥ dṛśyāḥ prabhābāhyāstu adṛśyāḥ |
SA16n1275:1364: saukṣmyānna dṛśyate yathā puruṣākāraḥ sthāṇurna vivektuṃ śakyaḥ |
SA16n1275:1370: yat vātopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat viparyastaṃ nīlakṛṣṇādirūpaṃ paśyet |
SA16n1275:1373: yat jāgaraṇopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat kampitavṛkṣādirūpaṃ prāyaḥ paśyati |
SA16n1275:1374: yat parikhedopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na budhyate |
SA16n1275:1386: (pṛ) pañca viṣayāḥ jñānābhāsagatatvāt jñeyā bhavantīti jñātameva |
SA16n1275:1388: (u) ūrdhvabhūmikatvānna jñāyate yathā prathamadhyānacittaṃ dvitīyadhyānatadūrdhvadharmān na vijānāti |
SA16n1275:1389: indriyaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā mandendriyasya cittaṃ tīkṣṇendriyasya cittagatadharmān na vijānāti |
SA16n1275:1390: puruṣaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā śrotraāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāminaścittagatadharmān na vijānāti |
SA16n1275:1391: balaprabhedānna jñāyate yathā yanmanovijñānaṃ yasmin dharme balavihīnaṃ na tena manovijñānena sa dharmo jñāyate |
SA16n1275:1393: manovijñānavijñeyadharmo na vikṣiptacittakamanovijñānena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati |
SA16n1275:1394: yathā pratyekabuddhamanovijñānabalavijñeyadharmo na śrāvakamano[vijñāna]balena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati |
SA16n1275:1400: yathā janāḥ saṃsāre pūrvānubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ smaranti |
SA16n1275:1402: āryāstu yadi vānubhūtaṃ yadivānanubhūtaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryajñānabalādvijānanti |
SA16n1275:1403: viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt jñāyate yathā rūpadhātukacittamanubhūya kāmadhātukadharmān vijānānti |
SA16n1275:1404: viparyayāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā satkāyadṛṣṭikacittaṃ pañcaskandhālambanaṃ nairātmyaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1275:1406: balāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā mṛdvindriyaḥ puruṣastīkṣṇendriyasya cittamāvṛtatayā na vijānāti |
SA16n1275:1409: (u) vikṣepaviparyayabhūtāveśā mānamadacittapramoṣā madyena vā auṣadhavyāmohena vā cittavibhramaḥ,
SA16n1275:1416: tasmādyadyaprāpya paśyati kasmānna sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatīti bhavadvacanamayuktam |
SA16n1275:1424: pratyutpanneṣu jñānamutpadyata iti yadavādīḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ vijñānamapi pratyutpannamātraṃ jñāpayet paracittajñānavat |
SA16n1275:1426: tat ṣaṣṭhamanaindriyeṇa pratyuktameva yaduta indriyaviṣayavijñānānugamakālaḥ sannipāta iti |
SA16n1275:1427: pratītya mano dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata itīdaṃ vacanañca tadā vyarthaṃ syāt prāptyabhāvāt |
SA16n1275:1434: yadavādīḥ viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śabdaḥ śrūyate |
SA16n1275:1438: yathā bhavānāha viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe bhāṣamāṇe śabdāt śabdasantatyā tanurbhūtvā na punarudbhavatītyato na śrūyata iti |
SA16n1275:1441: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmirgatvāpi sūryamaṇḍalamātraṃ paśyati na sūryasya karma |
SA16n1275:1443: śrotramaprāpyāpi śabda audārikaḥ san śrūyate sūkṣmastu na śrūyate |
SA16n1275:1444: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmiḥ sudūraṃ gacchannapi na śatasahasrāyutayojanāni prāpnoti |
SA16n1275:1445: prasannasalilādyāvṛtaṃ suṣṭhu paśyannapi bhittyādyāvṛtaṃ tu na paśyati |
SA16n1275:1452: tadā tu na kaścitpratikūle vāyau śṛṇotīti syāt |
SA16n1275:1454: tadā śabdo'pi pratikūlavāyau na kiñcidapi na śrotavyaḥ syāt |
SA16n1275:1460: yadavocaḥ śabdaḥ sākalyena śrūyata ityataḥ prāptipakṣe na rūpasama iti |
SA16n1275:1475: idānīṃ śabde kaḥ punaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śabdāntaraṃ janayati |
SA16n1275:1487: evaṃ ghaṇṭātaḥ śabda [udgate] sati ghaṇṭā niśśabdā syāt |
SA16n1275:1489: ato jñāyate śabdo ghaṇṭāyāṃ vartata iti |
SA16n1275:1492: yadi śabdo ghaṇṭāmāśrito ghaṇṭātaścāpi viyujyata iti |
SA16n1275:1495: dṛṣṭe vyavahāre ca nāsti kiñcit yathā ghaṇṭāsantatirutpadyata iti |
SA16n1275:1496: śabdasya cāsti digbhāgabhedo yaduta prācīśabdaḥ karṇadeśaṃ prāpnoti tadā na syāt ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ |
SA16n1275:1504: tathā no cet viddhaśabda iti nocyeta |
SA16n1275:1505: yaḥ śabdo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sannikṛṣṭaśca tau yugapat śrūyetām |
SA16n1275:1507: na hi paśyāmaḥ kṣaṇikadharmaḥ kasyacijjanaka iti |
SA16n1275:1512: ekañca na karma karmotpādakamiti vacanaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ syāt |
SA16n1275:1513: bhavatāṃ śāsane śabdaḥ śabdāntareṇa viruddhaḥ pṛthak,
SA16n1275:1525: (u) paśyasi khalu saṃyoga ekaḥ san yaṃ śabdamutpādayati [so]'pi tathā syāt |
SA16n1275:1528: evañca dravyaṃ pañcasvabhāvaṃ trisvabhāvaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ na syāt |
SA16n1275:1531: yathā vadanti śabdo guṇo'pi karmaṇā tulyo nirudhyate |
SA16n1275:1534: evaṃ śabdo'pi karagṛhīte khaḍge śabdaḥ spandena sahoparamati |
SA16n1275:1537: yathā kalpayasi ādyakarmaṇaḥ saṃskāra uttarottarakarmotpādaka iti |
SA16n1275:1545: pūrvaṃ karmaṇi niruddhe hi tadanantaraṃ dravyamutpadyate |
SA16n1275:1557: kiṃ yathā khalu viṣaṃ viṣauṣadhena viruddham |
SA16n1275:1559: tathā no cet ghaṇṭā na śabdadvayavatīti [na] syāt |
SA16n1275:1565: tathā no cet ekasminneva kṣaṇe ghaṇṭā śabdadvayavatī syāt |
SA16n1275:1568: yadi śabdāt śabdāntaramutpadyate tadā na hetumanuvarteta |
SA16n1275:1582: tasya rūpamupādāya jala ādarśe rūpamutpannaṃ syāt |
SA16n1275:1583: evaṃ jale candra ādarśe pratibimbameva rūpaṃ bhavet |
SA16n1275:1584: tathā ca vaiśeṣikasūtraṃ sarvaṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt |
SA16n1275:1590: khaḍgavaṃśādīnāmavayaveṣu mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭeṣu vibhajyamāneṣu ca mitho nodanācchabdo bhavati |
SA16n1275:1591: na ca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ saṃyogācchabdo bhavatīti |
SA16n1275:1596: kevalaṃ caturṣu mahābhūteṣu saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu vā śabda utpadyate |
SA16n1275:1601: (pṛ) yadyāha bhavān-gandho nāsikāṃ prāpto jighryata iti |
SA16n1275:1606: yadi manyase yat asmādgandhāt santatyā gandhakāraṇamutpadyata iti |
SA16n1275:1611: yadi kusumāvayavā gacchanti kusumāvayavasya rūpamapi draṣṭavyaṃ syāt |
SA16n1275:1618: (u) yatra sūkṣmāvayavarūpaṃ [tatra] tadgandho jighrayata iti pratyakṣadṛṣṭam |
SA16n1275:1631: yathā ekapalaṃ kuṅkuma[kusuamaṃ] sadā sagandhaṃ gatvāpi sadaikapalam |
SA16n1275:1633: yathā jalaghaṭa ekabindvapagame tatkṣayo na budhyate |
SA16n1275:1647: (u) na vayaṃ [svī] kurmaḥ kusumāvayavā vāyumanuvartanta iti |
SA16n1275:1648: nāpi vāyuḥ kusumasya gandhaṃ boḍhvā gamayatīti |
SA16n1275:1650: tadupādāya gandhavāyuḥ tataḥ samutpanno gandhavāyurnāsikāṃ prāpya jighryate |
SA16n1275:1660: sa kusumagandhaḥ kusume niṣpīḍite vā niṣpiṣṭe vā saṃparitāpite vā kṣīyate |
SA16n1275:1666: sa ca gandho dīrghakālaṃ tile vartate |
SA16n1275:1671: (u) ayaṃ tilagandhaḥ kusumamupādāya samutpanno na tilādviyujyate |
SA16n1275:1686: tatra nāsti vinigamakaṃ yadudakāvayavā stejovayavā eva vā vāyumanugacchanti,
SA16n1275:1688: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtram-trayaḥ sparśā sparśakāyā vā na pṛthivyudakatejasāmityadṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti jñāyate |
SA16n1275:1689: anena vacanena trividhāḥ sparśā vāyau kadācidāgantukā vā'nāgantukā vā syuḥ |
SA16n1275:1693: bhavato mataṃ yat dṛṣṭa udake tejasi śītoṣṇaspaśau staḥ |
SA16n1275:1696: evaṃ dṛṣṭapṛthivyāmanuṣṇāśītasparśo'stīti so'pi vāyvayavīyo na syāt |
SA16n1275:1700: kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ vāyusparśamātra manuṣṇāśītaṃ na tu pṛthivyavayava iti |
SA16n1275:1701: vayamapi vadāmo rūparasagandhasparśāḥ pṛthivyāmeva santi nābādiṣu iti |
SA16n1275:1702: yat bhavatāṃ matam-yat dṛṣṭeṣu abādiṣu rūpādikamastīti |
SA16n1275:1703: tat pṛthivīyogād dṛśyate na tu tat tatrāsti |
SA16n1275:1709: tadā sambhavati vaktum idaṃ rūpamabīyaṃ na pārthivamiti |
SA16n1275:1722: yatra nāsti tatra gandhamupādāya gandha utpadyate ityasya ko doṣaḥ |
SA16n1275:1723: yadavādīḥ pūrvaṃ gandho dūrāt jighryata ityaprāptyā syāditi |
SA16n1275:1731: ato jñāyate aprāpya na jighryata iti |
SA16n1275:1748: tathāpi tattejo vartate iti sparśātt jñāyate |
SA16n1275:1750: bhavatāṃ sūtre nāstyarūpaṃ teja ityayameva doṣaḥ |
SA16n1275:1762: yathā vā jvarārtasya puruṣasya tejaḥ kāyaniśritamasti |
SA16n1275:1774: kiñca mano gacchatīti kiṃ jñātvā gacchet |
SA16n1275:1782: yat cittaṃ manyate śrotraṃ gamiṣyāmīti tacchrotasmaraṇam |
SA16n1275:1788: yaḥ pumān pūrvaṃ nagarādīn dṛṣṭavān sa idānīṃ pūrvamanurudhya smarati na jānāti pratyutpannān |
SA16n1275:1794: yo dharmo gacchati sontarāle sarvān viṣayān jānīyāt |
SA16n1275:1795: yathā kaścitsañcaran madhyemārgaṃ rūpādīn padārthān jānāti |
SA16n1275:1797: yathā cittamasadapi jānāti yadutātītamanāgataṃ śagaśṛṅgaṃ kūrmaromāhipādaṃ vāyurūpaṃ lohitalavaṇagandhamityādīni [sarvāṇya] pijānāti |
SA16n1275:1824: tā vedanā stistraḥ-duḥkhāḥ vā sukhā vā aduḥkhāsukhā veti |
SA16n1275:1834: ālambanaṃ vijñānasaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa vijñānamityucyate ato na gacchati |
SA16n1275:1841: yathā kaścitsvapne pibati naiba tat tṛṣṇāmapanayati |
SA16n1275:1844: cittaṃ dṛṣṭe śrute mate jñāte dharmamātre vartate |
SA16n1275:1846: yadi gamanena prāpnoti tadā dharmāntaramapi jānīyāt |
SA16n1275:1884: kadācidyāni rūpādīnupādāya bhavanti tāni sanidarśanānīti brūyāt |
SA16n1275:1892: tīrthikā vadanti-saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāśca [rūpi] dravyasamavāyādarūpiṇo'pi cākṣuṣāṇīti |
SA16n1275:1893: ato bhagavānāha-eṣāṃ rūpamātraṃ sanidarśanam nānye dharmā iti |
SA16n1275:1907: yo dharmaḥ pratiniyataḥ sa pratiniyataṃ dharmaṃ pratihanti |
SA16n1275:1916: dharmo yadi pratiniyataḥ tadā [na] saṃkhyeyāni pañcendriyāṇi |
SA16n1275:1924: (pṛ) cakṣuṣo raśmirmahadalpaṃ paśyati sudūraṃ gatvāpi rūpamapratihataṃ paśyati |
SA16n1275:1926: raśmirayaṃ dve cakṣuṣyupādāyaikatra militvā ekībhūto rūpaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1275:1927: cakṣurekaṃ śrotraṃ nāsikā ca kāyasyāntarvartamānā na vibhaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1275:1928: ato bhavadvacanam anyatpaśyati anyadvijānāti idaṃ nirastam |
SA16n1275:1961: yadavādīḥ sannikarṣo nigūḍha ityato na dṛśyata iti |
SA16n1275:1973: karmabalena pariṇamitāni mahābhūtānīndriyāṇi bhūtvā vibhaktāni santi |
SA16n1275:2012: yathā catussatyābhisamaye dharmān sākṣātkṛtya [ta]ddharmatāṃ samyak bhāvayatīti sarvamidaṃ manovijñānenaiva |
SA16n1275:2017: kiṃ prāpya vijānāti kimaprāpyeti sarvaṃ pratyuktam |
SA16n1275:2035: hrasvadīrghādilakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñāne samutpadyate |
SA16n1275:2048: (u) [kasmiṃścit] dharme sthānāntara uddhite yadi parasyopakāro hiṃsā vā bhavati |
SA16n1275:2064: na tu vadanti ghaṭe śabda iti |
SA16n1275:2069: sattvānāṃ pūrvākṣiptakarmavāsanatvādyadi padārthā nityaṃ saśabdāḥ syuḥ tadā na tātkālikaḥ [śabdaḥ] |
SA16n1275:2073: mahābhūtānāṃ sadā mithaḥ sammardāt sarvaṃ saśabdaṃ syāt |
SA16n1275:2074: (u) na padārthānāṃ mithaḥ sammardaḥ sarvaḥ śabdahetuḥ |
SA16n1275:2088: (pṛ) saṃvṛtitaḥ sadā vadanti śabda ākāśaguṇa iti |
SA16n1275:2113: ākāśe vartamāne'pi auṣṇyamasti kadācit kadācinnetyākāśo nauṣṇyakāraṇamiti jñeyam |
SA16n1275:2119: dṛṣṭe tāvanna paśyāmaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśamupādatta iti |
SA16n1275:2143: yathā pūrvaṃ kusume gandhamāghrāya paścādvastre jighrataḥ ayamāgantukaḥ saṃbhavati |
SA16n1275:2149: yadi bravīṣi jalādāvasti rūpaṃ svata iti |
SA16n1275:2150: vayamapi vadema kāṃsyādau svata eva gandho'stīti |
SA16n1275:2151: yo dharmo yasya vastuno'vinirbhāgavartī sa tasyāsti |
SA16n1275:2152: ato yo gandho yatrāvinirbhāgavartī sa tasyaiva dravyasya gandhaḥ |
SA16n1275:2155: yathā vadanti-asti candramasi tejaḥ tejasaḥ pratiniyatoṣṇatā iti |
SA16n1275:2156: vadanti ca gharmagṛhe'gnyapagame'pi śiṣyamāṇasya dharmaṇo'sti sūkṣmaṃ rūpamiti |
SA16n1275:2168: candrādayaḥ śītā api taijasā iti bravīṣi |
SA16n1275:2181: ataḥ kāryata iti vacanaṃ na hetuḥ kalpate |
SA16n1275:2187: tejaso rūpaṃ bhāskaraṃ śuklam kāṃsyādīnāntu abhāsvaram |
SA16n1275:2188: kāṃsyāṃdīnāṃ tejasā vailakṣaṇye'pi tāni taijasadravyāṇīti jñāpyante |
SA16n1275:2196: asamyakcintanāt bravītha yūyaṃ-gandhaḥ pṛthivīmātre vidyata iti |
SA16n1275:2202: na tu caturṣu mahābhūteṣu tāratamyena bhavanti |
SA16n1275:2203: yathā vadanti pṛthivyā apāṃ bāhulyena madhura iti |
SA16n1275:2206: ato jñātavyam -padārthāt pṛthak [pṛthak] svabhāvo raso jāyata iti |
SA16n1275:2216: saṃvṛtyā rasā vibhaktāḥ yathā janā manyante madhuraṃ madhurameva bhavatīti |
SA16n1275:2224: sparśo nāma kaṭhinaṃ mṛdu guru laghu prabalaṃ durbalaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ karkaśaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ kṛśaṃ śthūlaṃ praśrabdhiḥ klamathamaklamathaṃ rogo viśeṣo vā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyamālasyaṃ gauravaṃ sammūrchanaṃ sammohaḥ stambharna vyathā śūlaṃ vijṛmbhikā jighatsā pipāsā santṛptiḥ sātaṃ visātaṃ maurarvyam ityādayaḥ |
SA16n1275:2232: [tādṛśa] niyamo nāstīti pūrvamevoktam-yaduta sarpirādīnāṃ niyatā śītatā kāṃsyādīnāmanuṣṇateti |
SA16n1275:2233: kiñcoktaṃ pūrvaṃ triṣu sparśeṣu yadi vāyavīya āgantukaḥ tadā sparśāntarābhāvādvāyuraniyatalakṣaṇaḥ syāt |
SA16n1275:2240: (u) kāṃsyādīni sarpirādīni ca kaṭhinadravyāṇi agnisaṃyogādravī bhavanti |
SA16n1275:2246: agnisaṃyoge sa sparśo yadi na vinaṣṭaḥ |
SA16n1275:2256: [tadā] paro'pi brūyāt payolakṣaṇamanirudhya kevalaṃ dadhilakṣaṇaṃ parāvartata iti |
SA16n1275:2258: yadi bravīṣi na paśyāmaḥ payaḥ punaḥ payorūpeṇeti |
SA16n1275:2261: anādau saṃsāre kiṃ dravyaṃ nāgninā dagdhaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:2264: ato jñāyate pāko na nityo'parāvṛtta iti |
SA16n1275:2265: evañca śītasparśe vinaṣṭe punaḥ śītasparśa utpadyate |
SA16n1275:2270: vaiśeṣikā vadanti-pṛthivīmātre pāko bhavati nāpsu iti |
SA16n1275:2271: bhiṣajastu vadanti-yastaptāṃ yavāgūṃ pāti sa vijātīyaṃ phalaṃ labhata iti |
SA16n1275:2291: yathā mārgavarge smṛterekasyā eva pañca nāmānyu[cyante] smṛtyupasthānaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smṛtibalaṃ smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyaksmṛtiriti |
SA16n1275:2294: sambodhirityādīni nānā pṛthak pṛthaṅ nāmāni bhavanti |
SA16n1275:2295: eka eva samādhiḥ dhyānaṃ vimuktiḥ nissṛtiḥ samāpattirityucyate |
SA16n1275:2299: yathoktaṃ sūtre-tasya kāmāsravāccittaṃ vimucyate avidyāsravaccittaṃ vimucyata iti |
SA16n1275:2302: api coktaṃ sūtre-yadā bhagavān sattvānāṃ kallacittaṃ mṛducittaṃ dāntacittaṃ vimuktilābhapravaṇatāñca prajānāti |
SA16n1275:2305: api coktaṃ sūtre-cittasaṃkleśātsattvāḥ saṃkliśyanti cittavyavadānātsattvā viśudhyanti |
SA16n1275:2308: sa duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgamāryasatyañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti |
SA16n1275:2313: api coktaṃ sūtre rāṣṭrapālamāhūyāvadat idaṃ vastu punaḥ punarājavajjavaṃ mahārāja cittaṃ vadāmi iti |
SA16n1275:2314: āha ca ādhyātmiko vijñānakāyo bāhyaṃ nāparūpamiti dvidhā bhavati |
SA16n1275:2320: ato jñāyate cittamātramasti na caitasikamasti pṛthagiti ||
SA16n1275:2336: yathā bhikṣurekākī san satsvapi maśakā[di] prāṇiṣu sajātīyo nāstīti ekākītyucyate |
SA16n1275:2337: ato jñāyate nānyacittena cittaṃ samprayujyata iti |
SA16n1275:2340: caitasikāstu ekena dhātunā ekenāyatanena tribhiḥ skandhaiśca saṅgṛhītāḥ |
SA16n1275:2358: tādṛśavibhāgāt jñāyate cittamanyat caitasikā anya iti |
SA16n1275:2382: puruṣasyāvidyayā saṃkleśaḥ prajñayā vyavadānamiti na bhavet |
SA16n1275:2388: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ dharmālambanaṃ cittaṃ cittaviśeṣāścaitasikā mārgavargoktavat iti |
SA16n1275:2405: sūtre bhagavān na pariniṣṭhitaṃ vakti idamasyādhivacanamiti |
SA16n1275:2406: yathāha sūtram-ekaṃ dharmaṃ prajahītha ahamājānāmi anāgāmimārgaṃ pratilabhadhve yadidaṃ kāmacchandam |
SA16n1275:2413: yaduktaṃ bāhyaṃ nāmarūpamiti sa eva caitasika [dharma] ityucyate |
SA16n1275:2418: yat bāhyaṃ sa eva viṣaya ityucyate |
SA16n1275:2444: evaṃ cittaṃ cittamāśrayata iti na nāmāntaraṃ labhate |
SA16n1275:2456: sa hi bravīti-pūrvaṃ vijñānasya kālaḥ paścātsaṃjñādīnām iti |
SA16n1275:2461: cittameva dvidhā vadāmi ekaṃ jñānamaparaṃ vijñānamiti |
SA16n1275:2463: yadāha bhavān-bhagavān svayamāha ye cittaniśritāste caitasikā iti |
SA16n1275:2467: kintu vadāmi cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti |
SA16n1275:2475: cittañca caitasikaiḥ saha cittādutpadyata iti caitasikamityucyate |
SA16n1275:2476: caitasikamātramastīti yo vadati sa vadet caitasikadharmā arthākhyā iti |
SA16n1275:2484: citta utpannaṃ cittameva citte vitarka udabhūdityucyate |
SA16n1275:2498: vijñānasya buddhervā [anyeṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ |
SA16n1275:2501: yathā laukikā vadanti yadbhavān vijānātīmaṃ puruṣamiti tat jñānameva vedanā saṃjñā iti jñeyam |
SA16n1275:2509: asmin cittaskandhe saṃkleśo'vidyā ca sarvathā saṃprayuktā |
SA16n1275:2516: ato jñāyate avidyāto'pi cittameva vimucyata iti |
SA16n1275:2519: yadi ca saṃkleśebhyaścittaṃ vimucyate avidyātaḥ prajñā vimucyata iti |
SA16n1275:2521: ataścittaṃ vinā na kiñcidvimucyata iti jñātavyam |
SA16n1275:2527: laukikā bhūyasā sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi vijānantīti vedanādayo [pi] vaktavyāḥ |
SA16n1275:2532: bhagavān sattvānāṃ kleśatāratamyavaśātsadā viṣādākrāntacittaḥ san vadati ayameko dharma iti |
SA16n1275:2544: dharmāṇāṃ sasamprayogatve'pi sparśa eva vedanādīnāṃ hetuḥ na vedanādayaḥ sparśasya |
SA16n1275:2558: yathā ca bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrapuṣpādīni hetuphalābhyāṃ kramikāni dṛṣṭāni |
SA16n1275:2560: yadbhavān manyate kāmādayaḥ kleśā rūpasya saha[bhū]hetavaḥ sahajāḥ syuriti |
SA16n1275:2577: (u) kasya pratibandhādekaṃ kramikamālambanaṃ na kramaśaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānyutpādayati |
SA16n1275:2578: jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścātkāryamiti kramaśa utpādaheturiti |
SA16n1275:2579: sūtre coktam-cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavatīti |
SA16n1275:2583: yo nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti sa dṛṣṭvā gṛhṇāti na darśanakāle |
SA16n1275:2585: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvānuprahṛṣṭacetano bhavati iti |
SA16n1275:2588: ato jñāyate na sarvaṃ cittaṃ vedanādisamanvitamiti |
SA16n1275:2592: tasya nāsti saṃjñā nāpi daurmanasyaṃ vā |
SA16n1275:2594: kecidāhuḥ tasyāpi kāmādayaḥ kleśā na santīti |
SA16n1275:2599: kiñca bhavataḥ pañca vijñānāni na vikalpakāni |
SA16n1275:2601: cetanāvikalpaḥ pūrvarbhaudārikaḥ san pañcātsūkṣmo bhavatītyato vitarkavicāraustaḥ |
SA16n1275:2603: tadyathā vadasi mayi tava jñāpanāya prathamata evābhyūhādhīno vitarka utpadyata iti |
SA16n1275:2609: ato'bhyupeyaṃ pañca vijñānāni asaṃjñāni avitarkāni avicārāṇīti |
SA16n1275:2611: na hi pañcavijñāneṣu strī puruṣa iti vikalpo'sti |
SA16n1275:2614: pañcavijñānānāṃ nirvikalpakatvāt tadanantaraṃ manovijñānamutpadyata iti yuṣmābhiruktam |
SA16n1275:2627: avidyā prajñā ca viruddhe na yugapatsyātām |
SA16n1275:2631: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti naikasmin citte samudācarati |
SA16n1275:2635: ayaṃ puruṣo mama jñāto māmupakṛtavāniti yat smaraṇam,
SA16n1275:2636: smṛtvā ca prītijananam tata kathamekasmin citte syāt |
SA16n1275:2645: ekasminneva hi citte'sti jñānamajñānaṃ saṃśayo niścayaḥ śraddhā'śraddhā vīryaṃ kausīdyamityevamādyā doṣāḥ |
SA16n1275:2646: sarve ca caitasikā ekasmina citte pariniṣṭhitāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1275:2647: kasya pratibandhāt sukhaṃ dukhaṃ rāgo dveṣa ityādayo na bhavantyekasmin citte |
SA16n1275:2648: yadyāha bhavān sukhaduḥkhādayo virodhānnaikasmin citte vartanta iti |
SA16n1275:2652: “yo bhikṣuścaturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati ca smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati |
SA16n1275:2661: upekṣāyāṃ prajānāti” iti caitasikāḥ kramikā bhavanti |
SA16n1275:2667: śīladharaḥ puruṣo na kaukṛtyabhāvāya cittaṃ praṇidadhāti |
SA16n1275:2681: yo bhikṣuralpeccho viharati sa santuṣṭo bhavati |
SA16n1275:2711: ārakṣāṃ pratītya daṇḍādānaśasrādānakalahavigrahavivādāḥ sarve duḥkhopāyāsādayaḥ sambhavanti |
SA16n1275:2720: cittacaittā ekakālikā iti vadatastrayāṇāṃ sannipāto nāsti |
SA16n1275:2721: ekaikaśa utpadyanta iti vadatastu asti trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ |
SA16n1275:2726: kasmāt yaḥ paśyati sa vedayata ayamātmeti |
SA16n1275:2734: asmin mate vividhaṃ nāmāsti yaduta sattvo devo manuṣyaḥ strī puruṣo mahānalpa iti |
SA16n1275:2735: evamādīni nāmāni sarvāṇi skandhān pratītya bhavanti |
SA16n1275:2736: yadi cittacaitasikāḥ kramikāḥ tadā skandhadvayaṃ pratītya puruṣo bhavet na skandhapañcakam |
SA16n1275:2741: ucyate tu sarvaskandhān pratītya na skandhadvayamātram |
SA16n1275:2743: asti ca sūtre samprayogo yadutendriyajñānasamprayuktā śraddhā iti |
SA16n1275:2744: api coktaṃ sūtre-sparśo vedanāsaṃjñāvitarkaiḥ sahaja iti |
SA16n1275:2748: kathaṃ vijñānasthitiṣu vedanādiṣu sthitamidaṃ niśrayate tiṣṭhatīti |
SA16n1275:2756: api coktaṃ sūtre-yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:2757: akālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānām yaduta dharmapravicayabodhyaṅgasya vīryabodhyaṅgasya prītibodhyaṅgasya |
SA16n1275:2760: [yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati] kālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyai yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya |
SA16n1275:2763: akāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya |
SA16n1275:2767: kāla [stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgasya vīryasaṃmbodhyaṅgasya prītisambodhyaṅgasya |
SA16n1275:2771: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ-ekakālaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bodhi[pakṣikā] dharmā na viyujyanta iti |
SA16n1275:2775: yaduktaṃ bhavatā-yaḥ paśyati sa vedayate sa ātmeti |
SA16n1275:2778: na vibhajanti vedaneyamidaṃ vijñānaṃ niśrayata iti |
SA16n1275:2780: te cittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvā avibhajanto vyavahāramātrāsaṅgā ttathā vadanti |
SA16n1275:2783: tatra pañcaskandhānāṃ santatiṃ pratītya puruṣa ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ skandhānāṃ vacanam |
SA16n1275:2802: yathā ca vadanti rājā mānthātā smṛtimātreṇa svargamāruroheti |
SA16n1275:2804: pṛthagjanānāṃ vijñānasyālambanakriyāyāṃ catvāro dharmāḥ kramikā bhavanti-vijñānānantarajā saṃjñā,
SA16n1275:2816: vitarkavicārau ca na saṃprayuktāviti pūrvameva pratyuktam |
SA16n1275:2818: tatsūtra uktā vijñānasya pratyaya[rūpā] sthitiḥ na niśrayarūpā |
SA16n1275:2820: tasminneva hi sūtra uktam-vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya snehapramodābhyāṃ tiṣṭhati |
SA16n1275:2822: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā- yadi vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya tiṣṭhati |
SA16n1275:2828: tatra tṛṣṇodbhavati udbhūtatṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānasthiti rityucyate |
SA16n1275:2847: yadi bravīṣi cittaṃ pūrvamutpadyate tanmahimnā caitasikānāmāśraya iti |
SA16n1275:2850: yadbravīṣi cittaṃ kleśasaṃkliṣṭamityato jñāyate'smi samprayoga iti |
SA16n1275:2853: tadā sa eva pariśuddhadharmā dūṣyo bhavatīti dharmalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyeta |
SA16n1275:2860: tathā ca sattvā api samprayuktāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1275:2879: caitasikāścittajāścittaniśritā iti yat bhavato vacanaṃ tatpūrvameva pratyuktam |
SA16n1275:2882: na tu sāhāyyāya mitha ālambane samudācarantīti |
SA16n1275:2891: tasmin samaye praśrabdhyādīni trīṇi bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmīti |
SA16n1275:2907: (pṛ) ājñātaṃ na santi pṛthak caitasikāḥ nāsti ca samprayoga iti |
SA16n1275:2932: saṃyogato viyogato vā hetusamanantarālambanādhipatīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viśeṣāccittāni bhidyante |
SA16n1275:2937: yathā sūryaraśmiḥ prakṛtito viśuddhā na kadāciddūṣyā bhavati |
SA16n1275:2938: yat prakṛtito'viśuddhaṃ na tat viśodhayituṃ śakyate |
SA16n1275:2939: yathā roma prakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nāvadātaṃ kartumarhati |
SA16n1275:2944: yathocyate bhikṣurvijñānamupabhuṅkte keṣāṃ vijñānaṃ yaduta sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhānāṃ vijñānam |
SA16n1275:2959: yathā markaṭopasūtra uktam-yathā markaṭaḥ [araṇya upavane caramāṇaḥ] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1275:2961: evameva cittaṃ [rātryā divasasya ca] atyayena anyadevotpadyata anyannirudhyate |
SA16n1275:2966: yat citta-[mityucyate tat rātryāśca divasasya] atyayena anyadevotpadyate'nyannirudhyata iti |
SA16n1275:2970: yathā caikaṃ karma [kṛtaṃ] na punarādeyaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:2982: ratnahārasūtra uktam-yaścittaṃ sadā śraddhayā śīlena tyāgena śrutena prajñayā ca bhāvayati sa mṛto deveṣūtpadyate iti |
SA16n1275:2983: dhyānasūtre coktam-prathamadhyānalābhī cittasya paridamanāya prathamadhyānādvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati |
SA16n1275:2992: tiṣṭha markaṭa mā [dhāvī] rna hi te tat yathā purā |
SA16n1275:2996: ata āha “mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathāpurā” | iti | āha ca-
SA16n1275:3001: ekameva hi cittaṃ karmāṇyabhinirvṛttya punarvipākaṃ vedayate |
SA16n1275:3002: cittaṃ mriyate cittamutpadyate cittaṃ badhyate cittaṃ mucyate |
SA16n1275:3020: yadekaṃ cittaṃ tadeva rūpaśabdādigrahaṇarūpāṇi nānākarmāṇi karoti |
SA16n1275:3021: yathaikaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcachidrake gṛhe sthitaḥ tatra tatra gatān viṣayān gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1275:3022: tadeva cittaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnamālokadipratyayamapekṣya rūpaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1275:3023: yathā sa eva puruṣa anyatra sahāyamapekṣya [aparaṃ] kāryaṃ karoti |
SA16n1275:3025: yathā sa eva pūrvaṃ jñānī san paścādajñānī bhavati |
SA16n1275:3026: evaṃ mithyājñānaṃ punaḥ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:3027: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ viśuddhaḥ paścādaviśuddho bhavati |
SA16n1275:3028: evaṃ yat sandigdhaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva niścitaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:3029: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃśayitaḥ punarniścito bhavati |
SA16n1275:3030: yadakuśalaṃ cittaṃ tadeva punaḥ kuśalamavyākṛtañca bhavati |
SA16n1275:3031: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ kadācitkuśalaṃ smarati |
SA16n1275:3034: yathā sa eva puruṣo'tītānāgatādau nāneryāpathān karoti |
SA16n1275:3037: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ prasannaḥ paścādaprasanno bhavati |
SA16n1275:3039: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvamanyaṃ sukhayati paścātpunarduḥkhayati |
SA16n1275:3045: yat vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ tat rūpamātraṃ gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1275:3051: yathā pradīpa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati anyānapi prakāśayati |
SA16n1275:3052: yathā gaṇaka ātmānaṃ gaṇayati anyānapi gaṇayati |
SA16n1275:3055: yathā markaṭaḥ śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti tāṃ muttkā'parāṃ gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1275:3059: svayameva punarvipākaṃ vedayate iti saṃkṣipya pratyavocam |
SA16n1275:3063: anyadvedayate anyanmṛnmriyate anyajjāyata ityādayo doṣāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1275:3080: tenaiva cittena tadeva smaryata iti kathaṃ bhaviṣyati |
SA16n1275:3094: idānīṃ kurvan paścātkariṣyan nitya eko'vikārītyata ātmā bhavati |
SA16n1275:3101: brahmādayo vyāmohagatā evaṃ manyante kāyo'yamanityaḥ cittaṃ vijñānantu nityam iti |
SA16n1275:3111: atītaṃ vastu asadapi smṛtvā vijānanti anāgatamasadapi [ārya] jñānabalādvijānanti |
SA16n1275:3129: evaṃ cakṣūrūpayoḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāśrityotpannaṃ vijñānamapi kṣaṇikam |
SA16n1275:3133: yadavādiḥ-vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ sat ālokamapekṣya paśyati |
SA16n1275:3134: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ityādi |
SA16n1275:3141: saṃśayajñānādīni niścayajñānādibhyo'nyāni na saṃśayajñānādīnyeva niścayajñānādīni ityapi vadāmaḥ |
SA16n1275:3155: ghaṭādi dravyamapi [paśyati] gaṇakastu ātmarūpamapi jānāti pararūpamapi jānāti |
SA16n1275:3166: tathā bandhamokṣādirapi yadavādīḥ- anyat karoti anyadvedayata iti |
SA16n1275:3170: saṃvṛtisaṃjñayā karmādīnāṃ vacanaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ |
SA16n1275:3183: yadi kṣaṇikaṃ [cittam] tadā rūpādīni na kadāpi pratīyeran |
SA16n1275:3185: yathā vidyutprabhā kiñcitsthāyinyapi na punaḥ sujñeyā bhavati |
SA16n1275:3190: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñāna [mutpadyate] ityanayorabhede vijñānamapyabhinnam |
SA16n1275:3204: ekaikasmin tantau pratyekamasti kiñcidvalam iti tatsamavāyaḥ prabhavati |
SA16n1275:3221: tathā no cet śabdakarmaṇo na syātpratyāyanam |
SA16n1275:3223: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalvidaṃ kṣaṇikamatha ca pratyāyakamiti |
SA16n1275:3239: vijñānañca viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti mandaṃ vā kṣipraṃ vā iti cittasya nāsti niyamaḥ |
SA16n1275:3253: yathā pradīpādayaḥ kṣaṇikā api [padārtha-] grahaṇasamarthā bhavanti |
SA16n1275:3259: puruṣasya kadāciccittaṃ bhavati yadahamekakālaṃ sarvānalambanān gṛhṇāmīti |
SA16n1275:3271: tasyaikameva jñānaṃ samyaṅ mithyā ca sambhavet |
SA16n1275:3272: ayaṃ puruṣa iti graha eva ayaṃ na puruṣa iti graha iti yathā darśanaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:3298: ato jñāyate bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpannāni sarvān spraṣṭavyān gṛhṇanti iti |
SA16n1275:3303: vahūni vijñānānīti kāyāvayaveṣu ca śīghrataraṃ jñānamutpadyate |
SA16n1275:3306: na hi sambhavatyekameva vijñānaṃ sarvānavayavān gṛhṇātīti |
SA16n1275:3307: ato ekakālamutpannāni bahūni vijñānāni sarvānavayavān gṛhṇantīti ||
SA16n1275:3310: atrocyate | yaducyate bhavatā-bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpadyanta iti |
SA16n1275:3318: ato jñāyate vijñānāni manaskāramapekṣya bhavanti naikakālikānīti |
SA16n1275:3332: tathā ca sarvadharmāṇāmutpattaye nāvaśyaṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt |
SA16n1275:3342: cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu bāhyān bījāṅkurādīn kalamāṃsapeśyādirūpāṇi kaumārayauvanajarākārān kramikān |
SA16n1275:3345: tadā [anye] dve vedane niruddhe yaduta duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityādi |
SA16n1275:3346: yadi vijñānānāṃ yugapadutpādaḥ tadā tisro vedanā ekakālaṃ vedyeran |
SA16n1275:3348: ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakāla mutpadyanta iti |
SA16n1275:3349: ekasmin kāya ekacittotpattyā ekaḥ puruṣa ityucyate |
SA16n1275:3350: vijñānānāṃ yaugapadya ekasmin kāye bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ |
SA16n1275:3352: ata ekasmin kāye vijñānānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ na sambhavati |
SA16n1275:3353: yaugapadye hi ekakālaṃ sarvān dharmān jānīyuḥ |
SA16n1275:3365: tathā mamāpi ekasya manasa ekaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ |
SA16n1275:3377: yathoktaṃ sūtre-kecitparīttasaṃjñāḥ kecidbahusaṃjñāḥ kecidapramāṇasaṃjñāḥ kecidakiñcanasaṃjñā iti |
SA16n1275:3378: vastutastu te bahu kiñcidādidharmā na santi |
SA16n1275:3387: saṃjñā tridhā vibhaktā grahālambanā yaduta priyadvepyodāsīnāḥ |
SA16n1275:3392: yathoktam-cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhvīta iti |
SA16n1275:3396: tathā saṃjñayā hi sarvān kleśān prajahāti |
SA16n1275:3397: yathoktaṃ sūtre-anityasaṃjñā sādhu bhāvitā sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāpayati |
SA16n1275:3410: yathā ca vadanti akṛṣṇāśuklakarmaṇā sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayatīti | vadanti ca-
SA16n1275:3413: vastutastu prajñayā tarati na tu śraddhādinā |
SA16n1275:3416: yathoktam-āryāstadantevāsino vā prajñābalena sarvān kleśān prajahatīti |
SA16n1275:3421: uktañca sūtre-jānan paśyan āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhate nājānan nāpaśyan iti |
SA16n1275:3423: āha ca bhagavān-prajñāskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho bhavati iti |
SA16n1275:3426: anukramasūtre coktam-viśuddhaśīladhāriṇo na cittaṃ paritapati yāvadyathābhūtajñānāya cittaṃ samādadhāti iti |
SA16n1275:3431: āha ca bhagavān-sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtajñānamanuttarā prajñā ityucyate |
SA16n1275:3433: prajñaiva sarvakleśānāṃ samucchedini na tu saṃjñeti yogo nyānyāḥ |
SA16n1275:3435: yathāha mahānidānasūtram-yacca sūtre'vatarati vinaye ca sandṛśyate dharmatāñca na vilomayati tat grāhyam iti |
SA16n1275:3436: api cāha-samyagarthe sthāpanā yathārtha [grahaṇam] samyak rute sthāpanā yathārūta [grahaṇam] iti |
SA16n1275:3437: ataḥ sūtre yadyapyuktam anityasaṃjñādayaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedakā iti |
SA16n1275:3442: ato jñāyate prajñayā sarve kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti |
SA16n1275:3446: prajñaptidharmāḥ pañca atītaḥ anāgataḥ saṅketaḥ saṃyogaḥ pudgala iti |
SA16n1275:3454: yathoktam-siṃho mṛgarāja iha nadītīre sthitastratra tīre nimittaṃ gṛhītvā oghaṃ tīrtvā niṣkrāmati |
SA16n1275:3455: tatra yadi nimittaṃ nāsti tadā idaṃ tīraṃ pratinivṛtya [tannimitta] māmaraṇaṃ na muñcati iti |
SA16n1275:3460: api cāha-[paśu] vadhako rājabhojanāyābhilaṣitaṃ nimittamupādatta iti |
SA16n1275:3462: kiñcāha- trīṇi nimittāni yaduta samādhinimittaṃ pragrahanimittamupekṣānimittamiti |
SA16n1275:3467: tatra pañca dharmā eva nimittāni bhavanti |
SA16n1275:3471: uktañca sūtre-cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti |
SA16n1275:3479: āha ca rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti |
SA16n1275:3481: kathaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti |
SA16n1275:3484: animitta[samādhe]rālambanamapi duṣṭamiti paścānnirodhasatya [varge]vakṣyate yat trividha cittanirodhī animittamādāvupasampadya viharatīti |
SA16n1275:3523: yathā kaścit yadā śītārtaḥ tadoṣṇasparśaḥ sukhamutpādayati |
SA16n1275:3524: (pṛ) nanu sa evoṣṇasparśaḥ utkaṭaḥ san duḥkhakaro bhavati |
SA16n1275:3532: yadi pūrvameva duḥkhaviyogaḥ tadoṣṇasparśo na sukhakaraḥ |
SA16n1275:3542: kiñcāha-rūpasya ka āsvādāḥ ye rūpamupādāya prītisukhajananā iti |
SA16n1275:3545: duḥkhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyā na duḥkhe sthite duḥkham |
SA16n1275:3547: aduḥkhāsukhavedanāyā na duḥkhaṃ jñāyate na sukhaṃ jñāyate iti |
SA16n1275:3560: na vaktavyaṃ duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo'nuśeta iti |
SA16n1275:3566: sarvo lokadhātu ā mahānarakamā ca bhavāgraṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇam |
SA16n1275:3568: yathā kaścit dharmataptaḥ śītasparśaṃ sukhaṃ manyate |
SA16n1275:3572: tathā no cet duḥkhālpatve sukhasaṃjñotpadyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA16n1275:3576: na hi paśyāmaḥ kathamapi sūkṣmaṃ sukhamanubhavantaṃ puruṣaṃ bāhumudyamya sudīrghamucchvasantam |
SA16n1275:3577: sukhā ca vedanā sūkṣmā pravṛttā upaśamalakṣaṇamityucyate |
SA16n1275:3579: ato yaduktaṃ sūkṣme sukhe duḥkhasaṃjñotpadyata iti tat vacanamātram |
SA16n1275:3580: bālapṛthagjanānāmalpaduḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā mithyā prādurbhavati iti tu nyāyyam ||
SA16n1275:3585: cīvarabhojanādayo hi sarve dūḥkhahetavaḥ na sukhahetavaḥ |
SA16n1275:3587: annavastrādiṣūtkaṭeṣu duḥkhamapi vardhata iti pratyakṣaṃ khalu |
SA16n1275:3594: yathā janā maraṇabhītāḥ [anyaṃ] daṇḍaṃ sukhaṃ manyante |
SA16n1275:3595: daṇḍādānaśastrādānakṣuraśaktayo duḥkhahetutayā niyatāḥ na tathā sukhahetutayā |
SA16n1275:3596: sarveṣāmavaśyamātyantikaduḥkhatvāt jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ [duḥkhaṃ] sadevordhvakālaṃ budhyate pādukākṣayavat |
SA16n1275:3606: yasya yatra sukhamabhūt tasya tadeva paścādduḥkhacittajanakamityato jñāyate nāsti sukhamiti |
SA16n1275:3611: kiñca janā duḥkhe sukhaviparyāsamutpādya paścāttatrābhiṣvajante sukhaṃ yadi kiñcidasti |
SA16n1275:3613: yathā nitya ātmā viśuddhaḥ kimapi vastu nāsti |
SA16n1275:3619: sūtre ca bhagavatoktam-sukhā bhikṣavo vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyā |
SA16n1275:3626: ato bhagavānāha-yatra pṛthagjanānāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate tat duḥkhato draṣṭavyamiti |
SA16n1275:3639: apara ādau mṛdurapi ante puruṣaṃ hinasti |
SA16n1275:3640: tadvatpadārthā api kecidādau subhakarā ante tu hiṃsrāḥ |
SA16n1275:3648: sarve sattvāḥ kāyikaduḥkhena vā caitasikaduḥkhena vā sadānugamyanta ityataḥ kāyo duḥkhamiti jñāyate |
SA16n1275:3657: kāyasya ca bahavaḥ śatravo yadutāśīviṣakāraṇḍaḥ pañcotkṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ kalyāṇamitravañcanāścorāḥ śūnyagrāme grāmaghātakāścorā mahānadyā avaratīram iti |
SA16n1275:3660: kiñca jānīmaḥ sattvānāṃ kāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhairanugamyate yaduta jātiduḥkhaṃ,
SA16n1275:3661: jarāduḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaduḥkhaṃ vipriyasamāgamaduḥkhaṃ priyaviyogaduḥkhaṃ prārthitādivighātaduḥkham ityādibhiḥ |
SA16n1275:3667: yathoktaṃ sūtre-rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ iti |
SA16n1275:3668: rūpa utpadyamāne jarāvyādhimaraṇādayaḥ sarva upadravā utpadyeran |
SA16n1275:3687: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre-rūpārāmā[bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparatā rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāmavirāganirodhāt duḥkhaṃ [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā viharanti |
SA16n1275:3704: yathā vanyapakṣiṇāmāhāraḥ matsyānāṃ bhakṣaṇapraskandanañca sarvaṃ grahaṇāya bhavati |
SA16n1275:3727: lābhakāle na tṛpyati strotaḥ kabalayan sāgara iva |
SA16n1275:3731: sattvāḥ sukhasādhanānveṣaṇakāle prapātacaṅkramaṇā[di] doṣamapi sukhato matvā na citte parikhidyante |
SA16n1275:3746: uktañca sūtre-dve ime bhikṣava āśe duṣprajahe |
SA16n1275:3749: eṣāṃ kāmānāmupabhogāya yā jīvita pratilābhāyāśā sā jīvitasyāśā |
SA16n1275:3751: ataḥ prajñāvatā yathābhūtaṃ sukhavedanālakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayatā duṣprahajā [pi] praheyā |
SA16n1275:3758: loke hi prājñā avaśyamuttamabhūmyāsvādamupādāyādharāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajanti |
SA16n1275:3767: idānīṃ kena vibhaṅgena santi tisro vedanā iti |
SA16n1275:3768: (u) ekasyā eva duḥkhavedanāyā kālabhedena trayaḥ prakārā bhavanti yat viheṭhakaṃ tat duḥkhamityucyate |
SA16n1275:3778: (u) puruṣo'yaṃ tribhiḥ sparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ yaduta duḥkhasparśaḥ sukhasparśa aduḥkhāsukhasparśa iti |
SA16n1275:3790: puruṣaṃ prati ālambanaṃ tridhā vibhaktaṃ priyaṃ dveṣyamudāsīnamiti |
SA16n1275:3804: pratikūlaṃ yatra cittaṃ tatra duḥkhā vedanā |
SA16n1275:3805: yatra na pratikūlaṃ nānukūlaṃ tatrāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā |
SA16n1275:3806: lokadharmāścāṣṭau lābho'lābho nindā praśaṃsā yaśo'yaśaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti |
SA16n1275:3815: ye cittopavicārāḥ kāyavartinaḥ te sarve'pi sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā bhavanti |
SA16n1275:3818: uktaṃ hi sūtre-aṣṭādaśa manaupavicārāḥ iti tatra kevalamekaṃ manaḥ aṣṭādaśadhāvibhaktaṃ yaduta ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā iti |
SA16n1275:3820: ato jñāyate sarve'pi cittopavicārā nāvedanā bhavantīti |
SA16n1275:3822: ato jñāyate cittopavicāreṣu dehagateṣu sarvaṃ duḥkhamityucyate |
SA16n1275:3823: āha ca yo rūpasyotpādaḥ sa duḥkhasyotpāda iti |
SA16n1275:3827: ataḥ sarve'pi cittopavicārā vedanā ityucyanta iti |
SA16n1275:3829: vipariṇāme duḥkhatvāt sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhato bhāvayet |
SA16n1275:3831: itīmāstisro vedanā duḥkhāḥ pratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ |
SA16n1275:3837: anāsravā vedanā api āryā anantaraṃ tyajanti |
SA16n1275:3843: ya āryā anāsravacittavihāriṇaḥ te sarvatra paraṃ nirvidyante |
SA16n1275:3851: te tasmin samaye sarve saṃskṛtā duḥkhamiti vyaktaṃ paśyanti |
SA16n1275:3852: yadyanāsravā vedanā sukhā tadā sukhe prāmodyeran na nirvāṇonmukhacittā bhaveyuḥ |
SA16n1275:3855: (u) ekaiva vedanā ālambane nānopavicaratīti vibhaktā bhavati |
SA16n1275:3859: imeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kāyagateṣu santi hitādayo viśeṣā ityato vedanetyākhyāyante |
SA16n1275:3864: aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ moho'nuśete iti tasmātsaṃjñāvikalpitā ālambane saumanasyādayo dharmā vedanā ityucyante |
SA16n1275:3875: puruṣasya tatra sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñānutpādādvastuno jñānadarśanābhāvācca kevalaṃ mohānuśayaḥ sambhavati |
SA16n1275:3876: upekṣālambane yadi rāgadveṣau na samudācarataḥ pṛthagjanāstadutkṛṣṭālambanamiti vadanti |
SA16n1275:3879: yathoktaṃ sūtre-prākṛtānāṃ yadrupe bhavatyupekṣā sa sarvā rūpaniścitā |
SA16n1275:3881: yo nikṛṣṭaṃ karoti tasya punā rāgadveṣau samudbhavata iti |
SA16n1275:3889: yo jānāti tadālambanaṃ tasya sukhaduḥkhe spaṣṭaṃ pratīyete |
SA16n1275:3893: (u) puruṣasyāsya tadā tadālambane na sukhacittamutpadyate na ca duḥkhacittam |
SA16n1275:3899: (u) puruṣasyāsya tasmin ālambane pūrvaṃ nimittagrahāt tatrālambane yadyavidyānuśayo yadi vā rāgadveṣānuśayo'sti |
SA16n1275:3901: yathoktaṃ sūtre-sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti |
SA16n1275:3902: tasya tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtamaprajānato yo'duḥkhāsukhasyāvedanāyā avidyānuśayaḥ so'nuśeta iti |
SA16n1275:3909: ata idaṃ sūtramevaṃ vaktavyam-aduḥkhāsukhāyāḥ samudayādyaprajānato'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmavidyānuśayo'nuśeta iti |
SA16n1275:3918: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā yathākālaṃ tridhā vibhaktā bhavati |
SA16n1275:3920: tasmin samaye duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā cotpadyate |
SA16n1275:3925: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre-tasya cet sukhā vedanotpadyate |
SA16n1275:3926: sa evaṃ prajānāti-utpannā khalu ma iyaṃ sukhā vedanā iti |
SA16n1275:3930: (u) sūtrasyāsya puruṣo vedayata ityābhiprāyikaṃ vacanaṃ ityadoṣaḥ |
SA16n1275:3931: sukhādivedanā kāya āgamya mana ālambate ityato'pyanavadyam |
SA16n1275:3935: ata ucyate sukhā vedanotpadyate cet sa yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti |
SA16n1275:3939: sūtre tūktam-sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti |
SA16n1275:3941: kena tadvedyata iti vedayatīti vedanā bhavati |
SA16n1275:3949: (u) ayaṃ padasyārthaḥ yat sanimittaṃ tat sakāritram |
SA16n1275:3950: prajñaptau sanimittāmimāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhāmaduḥkhāsukhāṃ [vedanāṃ] kāyagatāṃ cittamanubhavati |
SA16n1275:3954: kiṃ tasya tasmin samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā notpadyate |
SA16n1275:3955: (u) sarvaṃ duḥkhamityalabdhvā sa tisro vedanā anusmarati |
SA16n1275:3958: (u) sarvāsu vedanāsu evaṃ smṛtyunubandhāt syāt idaṃ kāyikaṃ sukham idaṃ caitasikaṃ sukhamiti |
SA16n1275:3964: tīrthikā hi vadanti vedanā ātmaniśritā iti |
SA16n1275:3965: ato bhagavānāha-vedanāḥ kāyaṃ cittañca niśritā iti |
SA16n1275:3974: (u) prahīṇāmiṣasya yā duḥkhā vedanā sā nirāmiṣā |
SA16n1275:3975: āmiṣāṇāṃ viruddhā duḥkhā vedanā itīyaṃ nirāmiṣetyucyate |
SA16n1275:3981: yathocyate sūtre-asti sāmiṣā prītiḥ asti nirāmiṣā prītiḥ |
SA16n1275:3983: sāmiṣā prītiriti pañcakāma guṇān pratītyotpadyate prītiḥ |
SA16n1275:3988: (pṛ) pañcasvindriyeṣu kasmādduḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedaneti pratyaṅgaṃ dvidhā vibhaktā |
SA16n1275:3997: atastṛtīyadhyāne prītiviśeṣaṃ niśrityocyate kāyena sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayatīti |
SA16n1275:4004: sattvāḥ duḥkhābhihatāḥ sukhārthitvāt ghaniṣṭhaṃ kleśamutpādayanti iti |
SA16n1275:4006: yathā pañcakāmaguṇasampannasya puruṣasya maśakapataṅgadaṃśe yo duḥkhānubhavo bhavati |
SA16n1275:4013: bahavaḥ sattvāḥ tisṛṣu durgatiṣūpapannā devamanuṣyebhyo nikṛṣṭāḥ |
SA16n1275:4016: yathā kṣetre tṛṇavīraṇāni svayaṃ prarohanti na sasyāni |
SA16n1275:4017: duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya guruke pāpakarmaṇi pravartate |
SA16n1275:4029: sā ca vedanā triṣu dhātuṣu vyāptā |
SA16n1275:4032: tadvedanārāgaṃ pratītya jīvati aśīti mahākalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhalakṣaṇān skandhānanubhavati |
SA16n1275:4039: sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā tu laukikamārgasyāpi doṣaprāpiṇī |
SA16n1275:4052: sukhendriyaṃ caturthadhyāne nirudhyate upekṣendriyaṃ nirodhasamāpattau nirudhyate |
SA16n1275:4058: (pṛ) rūpārūpyadhātau kuśaladharmān samyak bhāvayato duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nasyāt |
SA16n1275:4066: eṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ yā kācidvedanā sā duḥkhā vā sukhā vā bhavati |
SA16n1275:4071: yatkiñcanarūpaṃ [sarvaṃ tat] anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma iti rūpadhātoḥ sarūpatvāt astyāsvādacittaṃ,
SA16n1275:4080: yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya saṃjñā vedanā ca śalyam iti |
SA16n1275:4087: rūpārūpyadhātvorapi tathāṣṭasaṃskārāḥ samānamuktā iti kasmānnāsti duḥkham |
SA16n1275:4091: āha ca sūtram-atra santīrṣyāmātsaryādayaḥ kleśā iti |
SA16n1275:4092: yathā brahmā brahmāṇamāmantyāha-dhrūvamidaṃ sthānam mā bhavantaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramata iti |
SA16n1275:4095: api coktaṃ sūtre-tatrāsti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kleśa iti |
SA16n1275:4107: prākṛtānāmajñānāṃ kasya śaktibalena priyaprāptipratyayaṃ saumanasyaṃ na bhavati |
SA16n1275:4109: yathoktaṃ sūtre-mārgaṃ pratipannasyaivāyuṣo'nte rūpe saumanasyaṃ daurmanasya ñca nāsti iti |
SA16n1275:4110: ato jñāyate sarveṣāṃ prākṛtānāṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyaṃ sadānuvartate iti |
SA16n1275:4111: bhagavān svayamāha-daurmanasyavigataṃ saumanasyavigatañcaikaṃ cittamupekṣāyāmupavicaratītyayamarhato guṇa iti |
SA16n1275:4115: yathoktaṃ sūtre-prākṛtānāṃ yadupekṣācittaṃ sarvaṃ tat rūpaniśritaṃ na rūparāgavimuktam iti |
SA16n1275:4122: uttamabhūmau ca pravṛtte kāyacitte śāntasukhe na mahadanugṛhīte staḥ |
SA16n1275:4124: yadi [te] duḥkhopavicāriṇaḥ na te tadiryāpatheṣu dīrghakālaṃ sthātuṃ śaknuvanti |
SA16n1275:4125: yathoktaṃ sūtre-saptadināni samāviśya vimuktisukhaṃ vedayata iti |
SA16n1275:4127: yathoktaṃ sūtre praśrabdhiriti sukhā vedanā iti |
SA16n1275:4128: ato jñāyate sarvāsu bhūmiṣu asti sukhā vedaneti |
SA16n1275:4139: tasmāt ucyate [tatra] nāsti sukhaṃ nāsti duḥkhamiti |
SA16n1275:4140: tatra ca sukhaduḥkhe sūkṣme na pratīte staḥ |
SA16n1275:4141: asiśastrādi duḥkhaṃ bandhamaraṇādi daurmanasyañca nāstītyato nāsti duḥkhamiti |
SA16n1275:4145: yaducyate triṣu dhyāneṣu sattvā ekakāyā ekanimittā iti |
SA16n1275:4147: yathā vadanti-yo dhyānavihārī na samyak styānamiddhauddhatyānyapanayati so'viśuddhābha iti |
SA16n1275:4149: yathā ca laukikā vadanti alpalavaṇe bhojane alavaṇamiti |
SA16n1275:4150: evaṃ tatra saumanalyaṃ daurmanasya ñca na pratītamito nāstītyucyate |
SA16n1275:4152: uktañca sūtre bhagavatā saṃjñāpratyayo vitarka iti |
SA16n1275:4153: atra saṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ kathaṃ nāsti vitarkaḥ |
SA16n1275:4155: [cittasya] audārikatā vitarka iti dhyānadvaye niruddha ityucyate |
SA16n1275:4169: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-yathāpi [bhikṣavaḥ] yavakalāpī caturmahāpathe vikṣiptā syāt |
SA16n1275:4174: kiṃ punaridaṃ bhikṣavo bhavatāṃ manasi vipacyate na vā |
SA16n1275:4178: evaṃ hi sa moghapuruṣaḥ suhatataro bhavati |
SA16n1275:4188: yatrāsmīti tatreñjitaṃ manaskṛtaṃ prapañjitaṃ spanditaṃ rāgagatam iti |
SA16n1275:4191: kiñcāha-yo bālo janmaprabhṛti maitrīmabhyasyati so'kuśalaṃ karma karoti cetayate na vā |
SA16n1275:4194: āha ca cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti |
SA16n1275:4206: sahetusapratyayasūtra uktam-aśrutavataḥ pṛthagjanasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā iti |
SA16n1275:4208: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-duḥkhī bhūyasā sukhārthī kiṃ na prārthayate iti |
SA16n1275:4209: āha ca-yadā puruṣaḥ pañcakāmaguṇeṣu rajyate sa rāga eva prārthanā iti |
SA16n1275:4210: api cāha-tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamiti paryeṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavati paścādupādānam iti |
SA16n1275:4215: kasmāt upālisūtra uktam-asañcetanikaṃ karma na mahāsāvadyam |
SA16n1275:4218: yathā vadanti ko jñānī idaṃ kuryāt |
SA16n1275:4225: yathā kañcitpraṇidadhannāha-ahamanāgate'dhvani īdṛśaṃ kāyaṃ pratilapsya iti |
SA16n1275:4229: yathoktaṃsūtre-manaḥsañcetanāyā [bhikṣavaḥ] āhāre parijñāte tisrastṛṣṇāḥ parijñātā bhavanti |
SA16n1275:4243: kāryaprahāṇāddhetuprahāṇamuktaṃ yaduta manaḥsañcetanāhāraprahāṇāt tisṛṇāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ prahāṇamiti |
SA16n1275:4246: tṛṣṇā hi dvividhā hetubhūtā phalabhūtā ceti |
SA16n1275:4249: codayati | yadi hetvavasthāyāṃ tṛṣṇā phalāvasthāyāṃ cetanā |
SA16n1275:4252: yo dharmo hetvavasthaḥ so'nyaḥ phalāvastha ścānyaḥ ityato jñāyate cetanā na tṛṣṇāṅgamiti |
SA16n1275:4253: yathoktaṃ sahetusapratyaya sūtre mūḍhasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā |
SA16n1275:4256: yasya yasmin vastuni rāgaḥ tasya tasmin vastuni prārthanā |
SA16n1275:4271: manasā cet praduṣṭhena bhāṣate vā karoti vā |
SA16n1275:4281: yadā puruṣaḥ parasattvānāṃ kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā prārthayate |
SA16n1275:4287: ato jñāyate ekaiva cetanā nānānāmabhirucyata iti |
SA16n1275:4302: ato jñāyate asti ca caitasika dharmaḥ sparśākhya iti |
SA16n1275:4304: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre avidyādīnāṃ sparśo [hetu] rdraṣṭavya iti |
SA16n1275:4306: na punaḥ pṛthak vaktavyaṃ sa prajñaptidharma iti |
SA16n1275:4307: sūtre cāsti dvividhaḥ sparśaḥ eka trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti |
SA16n1275:4309: ato jñāyate dvividhayoḥ sparśayorekaḥ svarūpasan aparaḥ prajñaptisanniti |
SA16n1275:4314: yathā ca bhikṣūṇāṃ samavāyo na bhikṣubhyo'nyaḥ |
SA16n1275:4319: evaṃ sparśo'pi na cakṣurādibhyo bhidyata iti nāstyavadyam |
SA16n1275:4321: prāguktaṃ mayā [yadā] cittamālambanaṃ gṛhāti tasmin samaye sparśa iti |
SA16n1275:4326: na vayaṃ svīkurmaḥ sparśo'yaṃ dvividha iti |
SA16n1275:4333: ato jñāyate sa sparśo na tribhyo bhidyata iti |
SA16n1275:4334: kiñca yadi sparśaścaitasikadharmaḥ tadā anyebhyaścaitasikebhyo bhidyeta |
SA16n1275:4341: yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā |
SA16n1275:4342: (u) sparśasya kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yadanyacaitasikānāṃ noktaṃ syāt |
SA16n1275:4345: vedanā''dyakālīnā tṛṣṇā'nantarakālīnā iti vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tu tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā |
SA16n1275:4348: na tūcyata iti jñātavyaṃ nāsti vibhinnaḥ [sparśa] iti |
SA16n1275:4350: yathāha yo duḥkhopaghātaḥ sa āgatya janakāyaṃ spṛśatīti |
SA16n1275:4354: bhagavān sūcīlomaṃ yakṣamāha-tava saṃsparśaḥ pāpaka iti kāyamapanayāmi iti |
SA16n1275:4355: yathā loke vadanti sukha uṣṇasaṃsparśa iti |
SA16n1275:4367: ato jñāyate nāsti pāramārthikaḥ pṛthak caitasikadharma iti |
SA16n1275:4368: yo dharmaḥ kāyagataḥ sa sparśa ityucyate |
SA16n1275:4369: yat vedanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ hetukriyāṃ prayacchati tasmin samaye sparśa iti nāma pradīyate ||
SA16n1275:4380: (pṛ) kiṃ vijñānānāṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ manaskārabalenotpadyate kiṃ vā na |
SA16n1275:4386: kadācidālambanabalādutpadyate yathā dūrataḥ pradīpaṃ paśyan tasya kampaṃ paśyati |
SA16n1275:4397: kadācitsamādhibalādutpadyate yathaikatra pratibaddhacitto vijñāne prakarṣaṃ prajānāti |
SA16n1275:4403: saukumāryādutpadyate yathā lomākṣigataṃ sat cittasya duḥkhajanakaṃ nānyatra gatam |
SA16n1275:4415: ata evamāha-kasyacit cittāntarajanakamanaskāre'sati vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti |
SA16n1275:4428: yathā vadanti samyak praśnaḥ samyag dūṣaṇaṃ,
SA16n1275:4432: ato jñāyate yuktayanuyāyimanaskāraḥ tattvamanaskāra ityādayaḥ samyaṅ manaskārāḥ |
SA16n1275:4448: tada mama śāsanaṃ suciraṃ tiṣṭhet iti |
SA16n1275:4454: āha ca-tvaṃ vihāyasā gamanaṃ chandayasi iti |
SA16n1275:4455: tenakhalu samayena sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ svādhyāyabahulo viharati |
SA16n1275:4457: atha khalu tasminvanaṣaṇḍe adhivasantī devatā tasya bhikṣordharmaśṛṇvantī yena sa bhikṣuḥ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ |
SA16n1275:4459: kasmāt dharmapadāni tvaṃ bhikṣurnādhyepi bhikṣubhiḥ sukhaṃ vasan |
SA16n1275:4460: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ labhate prasādaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme labhate praśaṃsām || iti |
SA16n1275:4461: abhut pūrvaṃ dharmapadeṣu chando yāvadvirāgeṇa samāgato'smi |
SA16n1275:4462: yato virāgeṇa samāgato'smi yatkiñcidṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā |
SA16n1275:4473: bhagavān yat sattvānāṃ nānādhātūn prajānāti tat dhātujñānabalam |
SA16n1275:4492: (pṛ) tathā cet svayaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ śraddhā na syāt |
SA16n1275:4498: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ bhagavan asmin vastuni yathā bhagavadvacanaṃ śraddhadha iti |
SA16n1275:4502: tasyeyaṃ cintā bhavati sa dharmaḥ paramārthasatyo na mṛṣeti,
SA16n1275:4505: tadyathā rogī pūrvaṃ bhiṣagvacane śraddadhāna auṣadhamupasevya rogānmuktaḥ paścāttasmin bhiṣaji prasannacitto bhavati |
SA16n1275:4509: jñānajā yathā caturṣu [avetya] prasādeṣu buddhādiṣu cittaprasādaḥ |
SA16n1275:4510: sā tridhā vibhaktā kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ceti |
SA16n1275:4516: tathā no cet akuśalā vedanā vedanā na syāt |
SA16n1275:4519: yā śraddhā indriyeṣu gaṇitā vimuktyanugāminī saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣikeṣu gatā sā niyamena kuśalaiva |
SA16n1275:4524: tatrāmyutsāhaḥ sadā cittaikāgratāsamudācāraḥ sa vyavasāya ityucyate |
SA16n1275:4526: yat caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣu antargataḥ sa kuśalaḥ |
SA16n1275:4529: tasya paścādutpadyate vyavasāyo'kuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ samādānāya |
SA16n1275:4538: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat ciraviprakṛṣṭānubhūtaṃ smarati na pramuṣati sā smṛtirityucyate |
SA16n1275:4551: tatra pratyutpannā prajñaiva na tu smṛtiḥ |
SA16n1275:4552: atastathāgato [yadā] pūrvaṃ smṛtināmnā vimuktimuktavān tadā tāmeva prajñetyavocat |
SA16n1275:4554: (u) smṛterdharmaṃ evaṃ yat svasantāne yo dharmaḥ [pūrva] mutpannaniruddhaḥ tameva [svasantānikaṃ] viprakṛṣṭaṃ vijñānāntaramālambata iti |
SA16n1275:4555: jñānānāṃ vijñānadharmaśca tathā yat vijñānāntarānumūtaṃ vijñānāntaraṃ vijānātīti |
SA16n1275:4556: yathā cakṣurvijñānena vijñātaṃ rūpaṃ manovijñānaṃ vijānāti |
SA16n1275:4564: yathā bhagavān salyakaṃ nāthaputramavocat pūrvaṃ manasi kṛtvā vyākuruṣva iti |
SA16n1275:4566: ato vijñaptyādidharmā api pūrvavastvanusmaraṇarūpā smṛtaya ityucyante |
SA16n1275:4570: samādhiḥ prajñā ca samādhivarge prajñāvarge ca vakṣyate ||
SA16n1275:4573: yat cittaṃ vyagraṃ muharmuhurālambhakaṃ sa vitarkaḥ |
SA16n1275:4579: yā cittasya vyagratā kiñcitsūkṣmatā sa vicāraḥ |
SA16n1275:4586: ato'pratyakṣavastuno'nuvitarkaḥ samyagvitarko vā mithyāvitarko vā iti taṃ kathayāmaḥ |
SA16n1275:4590: samyagvitarkaḥ yadapratilabdhaṃ tattvajñānamanumitilakṣaṇena jñānena labdhvā yogī nirvedhabhāgīyakuśalamūle vartate |
SA16n1275:4594: tasminneva vitarke anena hetunā evaṃ bhavati anena hetunā naivaṃ bhavati iti cintanā vicāraṇā vā sa vicāraḥ |
SA16n1275:4609: yat kuśalasyānācaraṇaṃ mithyācaraṇaṃ vā sa pramādaḥ |
SA16n1275:4633: [anye] kecidāhuḥ trīṇi tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā iti |
SA16n1275:4635: avyākṛtānugaṃ cittaṃ yaddhetujaṃ sa heturavyākṛtamūlaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:4638: cittasamācaraṇakāle yat kāyaścittaṃ dauṣṭhalyavigataṃ praśāntaṃ bhavati |
SA16n1275:4642: dhyāneṣu yat sukhaduḥkhaviviktaṃ vimuktiparāyaṇaṃ cittasamācaraṇaṃ sopekṣā |
SA16n1275:4650: aprāptiḥ asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ nirodhasamāpattiḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ jātiḥ vyayaḥ sthitiḥ anyathātvaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ nāmakāyaḥ padakāyo vyañjanakāyaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ ityādayaḥ |
SA16n1275:4662: uktaṃ hi sūtre yaḥ puṇyaṃ pāpañca karoti |
SA16n1275:4665: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-mṛtasya puṇyaṃ na praṇaśyati yaduta phalaprāpakameva |
SA16n1275:4689: na hi nirudhyante pṛthagjanānāṃ cittacaitasikadharmā iti paścādvakṣyate |
SA16n1275:4705: bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ gabhīraṃ yatpratyayānāṃ sāmagryā dharmā utpadyanta iti |
SA16n1275:4710: kiñca vadanti jātyādayo dharmā ekakālīnā iti |
SA16n1275:4714: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmin tasmin [sattvanikāye] jātiḥ skandhānāṃ pratilābhaḥ....... [sā jātiḥ] iti |
SA16n1275:4720: vyañjanebhya utpannaṃ nāma yathā vadanti devadatta iti |
